name: Kholi Mane
review: Mouth watering food especially neer dosa amazing food at pretty good price

name: Harshi Super Sandwich
review:
Good place for a quick sandwich in NRColony It is at a walkable distance from Netkallappa Circle

Ambience  It is a very small shop You have to stand on the road and it Take away is a better option at this place

Service  The person taking is very courteous I was here on a weekday evening so the place was empty The sandwich was served in 10mins

Food  I had the Harshi special Sandwich

It had grated carrot corn and capsicum It was pretty spicy They use the regular white bread which is quite small so one sandwich will not be enough

name: Cake Yard
review: Poor response from service staffs when asked about available cakesthey dont know English and they are not providing the proper answer just blabbering

name: Cake Yard
review: No proper decorate on cake simple n plan

name: Cake Yard
review: too much cream on the cake

name: Cake Yard
review: the cake was melted the cream was all attached to the box it was not in good condition

name: Cake Yard
review: good cake

name: Cake Yard
review: had order a cake for birthday and the cake was damaged on delivery

name: Cake Yard
review: superb

name: Cake Yard
review: Very bad service

name: Cake Yard
review: its very good

name: Cake Yard
review: We ordered red velvet cake they made normal cake to red worst experience  Please never visit this shop They are worst people They use very cheap cream material

name: Cake Yard
review:
Cake yard attracts many people with its name 
This place is located near krishna rao park 
I was here with my family to have a nice pastry  
As we entered lot of pastries are displayed  variation of flavors colors and shapes 
and we ordered for creamy chocolate 
This chocolate cake was displayed beautifully and attracted me
but i dont understand the way it tasted for me
pastry was made with chocolate and groundnut  
Groundnut seriously  i didnt like 

Taste  2
Rate  3  Pocket friendly

Enjoy your foood

sandeepkasalwordpresscom

name: Cake Yard
review: This is one good option to buy pastries birthday cakes cookies naans puffs etc in this part of Basavanagudi The bakes are serves fresh The store is pretty clean  tidy too On weekends they offer discount on the cookies too The rates are pretty reasonable  the taste good Yes I will be back soon to try some other pastry or puff soon

name: Cake Yard
review:
As my foodie friend Mahima Koteshwar rightly reviewed We had this cake for one of our friends birthday I was little hesitant in the beginning to try a new place for an occasion It turned out to be great Black Forest pastry was fresh yummy and bang on

Would love to be back here for more pastries 

knowfoodknowmewordpresscom

name: Cake Yard
review:
Just happened to be a friends birthday and the others picked up a cake from here and I was quite skeptical about this place as its pretty new and I didnt know if the cake would turn out to be one of like the typical bakery cakes 

It was a blackforest cake  it looked very ordinary like a sweet chariot presentation it so happened that  which also was surprising  the cream was fluffy and the cake tasted good It wasnt anything extra ordinary but it was good A simple and a good cake

Since it was an emergency and the cake was bought at the very last minute  I cant complain much  It was fine and I wouldnt mind having these cakes again be it with or without occasion

name: Cake Yard
review: Our anyday choice for occasional cakes was Ammas pastries Since we wanted to try something new we opted to tryout this place This place is situated near Krishna Rao park on kanakapura road There werent much options to choose from We bought a Honey almond cake and some cookies The cake was too dry and average Cookies were just ok When compared to other similar places which serves pastries this place is quite pricey

name: Cake Yard
review: The taste of the pastries Gateaux are good Not very pricy But a very bad thing about this place is that they dont accept cards So better carry cash along with you or there is an ATM opposite to it but crossing that on a busy weekend evening is also a tough task

name: Cake Yard
review: bought some assorted parties dint like any some how the quality of the pastry is not that great and we can get better ones elsewhere i do not think i will visit again This cake shop is very nearby to my house but ts a big let down

name: Rosewood International Hotel - Bar & Restaurant
review:
Awesome food Great serviceFriendly staffsGood quality of food
 Complimentary Breakfast 
 Honey Lemon Chicken and Chicken Manchow Soup
Perfect place too stay alone or with family Will stay whenever I will go Bangalore

name: Rosewood International Hotel - Bar & Restaurant
review:
Newly Launched Bar  Restaurant Good Food quality Like to visit again Also like to suggest to others
Nice Ambiance and setting Also outdoor dining is available Did like the Chicken grill

name: Cake Art
review: Bad quality of puff and Bombay salt oil used for preparing mixture and other items are smelly may be there are no buyers for it Cakes samosa and jilebi are average

name: Cake Art
review: This bakery has been here since a long time The taste is quite good They were having large number of customers but they lost more than half of their customers since they renovated the place i dont know the reasons

name: Cake Art
review:
The Shop looks good from the outside
The cakes are nothing greatBut Pretty cheap
Sponge cakes are too soggyAlmost as if They were Just pulled out from Freezer after a few days  some water was splashed on them to keep them moist
The Pastries only Appear good

name: Cake Art
review: Their cakes are affordable and artistic It is a bakery given a facelift to pastry shop The pastries are good mousse are above average It is the normal savories baked biscuits and normal cakes which are still the USP

name: Cake Art
review: Fine cakes with nicely stored enjoyed black forest and white forest some times samosa is also nice hereKurkure items like fried ground nuts and kodubale chakkali fine to enjoy

name: Cake Art
review:
Cake Art is a Bakery where they serve some beautiful cakes  pastries at affordable prices in the locality I tried their Black Forest and Butter Scotch pastries and quite decent but not best They also have bakery products ones we get at Iyengars Bakery The Shop is well maintained with decent dcor and hygienic though During my last visit price of 1kg pastry was around 350 bucks which I feel affordable and value for money

I prefer this outlet for the traditional cream cakes we hardly see now days I like those cakes better than pastries Recommended place for bakery products

bangaloreepicurecom

name: Aahar Cafe
review: Ververy badnot good always same food dont go here friendsits my advicepreviously it was okmy stomach was upset wen i ate idli here

name: Potato House
review: quantity was less according to the price

name: Potato House
review:
Simple and damn tasty food is what describes them best
Potato house is a tiny place with limited seating located near Chikkalsandra post office
I have tried almost everything on their menu Must haves are Kachi Dabeli Vada Pav Sabu Vada Aloo sandwich
Quick service and nice people too Do visit them or order via Swiggy

name: Potato House
review: Its a total combination of good food hygienic and tasty food this restaurant is runned by all family members dedicated to serve healthy food with no preservatives added Food served with a smile always Recommend friends to visit once

name: Potato House
review: Clean and Hygienic Eatery from the House Recipe quickly served with no waiting time Evening snacks for quick bites with variety of dishes

name: Potato House
review: Serves quality snacks with an entire family dedicated to serving Mumbai special snacks like vadapav finger chip nurgers vadapav etc Except for the time of serving everything else is good Its a very small outlet with little space for seating but they provide parcel packing and can order in via swiggy too

name: Hotel Biriyani Counter
review:
Delivery by zomato on time
Response on call good
Food quality average biryani was poor
Packing average
Quantity as per price no

Ordered biryani they sent normal bullet rice biryani even it was not hotgiven one egg also
Ordered full biryani paid 130 but did not looked like full biryanirice was not biryani rice Biryani was not testy

Apart of this chicken manchurian was good but quality was not as per 130
Guntor chicken was spicy but piece was lesspacking was also not goodcurry spread over bag

name: Matru Sagar
review: Good place with dinner with family decent option on Mysore road South Indian North Indian and Chinese foods also very tasty And Good responsible people

name: Matru Sagar
review: The food was absolutely wonderful from preparation to presentation very pleasing We especially enjoyed the North Indian foods and Matru Sagar Special Ice cream Great value for the price We highly recommend it

name: Matru Sagar
review: Thanks to Zomato Matru Sagar fast delivery  food tastes good I recommended guys they taken only few min to deliver I really appreciate it thank you soooooo much

name: Matru Sagar
review: Staff doesnt have any sense at all They start abusing if you press them for getting something A place that should never be visited by a family at least Not possible to give minus rating otherwise 1 is also too much for this place

name: Matru Sagar
review:
Though the food is okay in this place the customer experience you get from their staff is miserable to say the least  To get a simple order they made me wait for 1 hour and when i checked about my order instead of being apologetic  the stupid manager started throwing attitude and arguing with me with some lame excuses HORRIBLE CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE I am for sure never going to visit this place again and will ensure that none of my family and friends visit this place  This is the second time that I have experienced such a thing from this place 
Though the hotel owner is a good person he needs to check the quality of staff members he has All the best

name: Matru Sagar
review: Our preferred place for quick food as its closer to our house Good food and picket friendlychats are just okthe service is good and no problem for parking as well

name: Matru Sagar
review:
A pretty decent option in this part of the city for a quick breakfast or lunch before you head out elsewhere We had our breakfast there after a long tiring night journey Hunger was killing us thank goodness the waiter came up with our Puris vadas and coffees pretty quickly The first floor is more peaceful and suitable for families who prefer a little more comfort than what is being offered in the ground floor
Overall a pretty nice place for South Indian food in this area

name: Matru Sagar
review: Good food Good ambience Best in this part of town Worth for money and hoping to come back soon once again Good place to dinner with family

name: Matru Sagar
review: Decent option on Mysore Roadambience service food all ok The masala papas here was yum with coconut shavings on top which adds to taste of onions tomatoes n coriander leaves

name: Matru Sagar
review:
Decent food on mysore road South and North Indian meals are decent
Mushroom Manchurian was tasty
Mushroom fried rice and noodles are also tasty

name: Ugadi
review: I just love the biryani here and also kababs and tandoori Even they have best seafood here I will definitely recommend this if u are a seafood and chicken lover

name: Ugadi
review: One of the worst services ever If the hotel management spends even 5  of their profits on hiring service staff they can improve the service by 1000 times strictly avoid After such an experience it doesnt matter how the food was it wasnt good anyways

name: Ugadi
review:
The best Andhra style cuisine I have had in Bangalore definitely the best Andhra meals and briyani to go for Hoping to come everyday for my meal
good food great service

name: Ugadi
review: Awesome service and tasty food I would like to go there again and again the way they were attending us was great with this service they well reach heights

name: Ugadi
review: Lot of reviews show it is not serving upto level food Maybe my day was one of the restaurants better ones  Suggested by a colleague To start Andhra chilli chicken One thing i need to say abt this dish If anyone is dammnn big fan of green chillies Please go for it For others its a big no no Chicken kebab biryani tasted nice The biryani rice was fine But the kebabs were amazing  Other items were descent enough as well

name: Ugadi
review: Never visit this place Worst service food place They wont even serve water initially Only when u will ask for bill then only they will get water Biryani also is bad

name: Ugadi
review:
Biryani was good But less quantity
Biryani was good But less quantity
Biryani was good But less quantity

Biryani was good But less quantity

name: Ugadi
review: Lovely Andhra meals tried alot of places for andhra meals specially but this places had a variety of flavours Veg meals I ordered the ugadi special chicken it was lovely  The place has to work on the power supply cuz the AC werent working cuz of power cut This place has the taste of Andhra

name: Ugadi
review: Very average restaurant May be it was good when it started but no where its Food matches with Andhra Style  I tried chicken starters and tasted very bad and this is must avoid place

name: Ugadi
review:
Biggest NO
Ordered plain Veg Sweet corn soup but was served with a garnishing of Cockroach Brought the same to the attention of the manager Instead of taking it right away he called the person who served it Had to withstand it some more time Started walking out as soon as the dish was taken away Manager didnt even bother to apologize Went to the person sitting at the cash counter told him I got cockroach in veg soup He said OK Left the place disgusted

name: Ugadi
review: Good place to have food If you are north Indian go to this place will find paratha here just order chapati as they have different terminology

name: Ugadi
review: Pure Andhra style In Telugu we call it as pandaga bhojanam I feel like having food at my home Found one of the best place Ambiance is good and service is amazing Will definitely visit soon

name: Ugadi
review: Lets keep it short  I should have stepped back when I saw very less crowd sitting on hot sunny Saturday The worst biryani I had ever The disgusting andhra chilli chicken In short AVOID THIS PLACE

name: Ugadi
review: Average biryani satisfying thali and good kheema balls Why am I reviewing a place where I had only few items Because this place served a pretty decent food but the pricing was a little too steep Would I go back Not really Would I suggest it to people Maybe just once Heavy on the pockets

name: Ugadi
review:
Actually a big NO to this place Dont go to this place for food you will get disappointed only And according to people this place was used to be serve good food Now the reduced there quality very badly

Aw I went there with ma frns for lunch  and orders veg biryani for me and ugadi special chikan biryani for them Both the briyanis was a big disappointments to us Its like rice bathyou can get from sagar hotels with a lil khada garam masala Curry was totally hopeless  Same with special ugadi chikan briyani

Dnt waste your time by going there

Keep eating

name: Ugadi
review:
Disgusting food and hopeless service 
I will come back and write the rest of review when I have time

Will be back just for the review

name: Ugadi
review: We went today the food cleanliness decoram etc was all nice but one of the drawbacks they had was their service They had a pile of orders in the 1st floor even though it wasnt crowded much which made them confused with our orders thus making them slow Sofood3 stars service09 stars and cleanlinessdecoram etc11 stars

name: Ugadi
review: This is exactly the place for you if you are looking for some spicy food The food was very tasty but the service was poor There was no one to serve a glass of water even after asking repeatedly 4 stars for the food and 1 star for the service

name: Ugadi
review:
In a narrow lane next to Jaya nagar Bus stand this place is clean and looks decent enough We just tried the Veg thali called as Pandaga bhojanam and Ugadi special chicken Biryani
Biryani is served with hot boneless chicken gravy which tasted ok Nothing stands out
There are better places for Andhra food

name: Ugadi
review: Order any biryani it tastes equally good Ps If u dont like spicy food dont come here this is is not the place for u Ambience is finefood quantity is good too

name: Ugadi
review:
Not worth an attempt  Poor service Poor Food choices Poor taste Over Priced Dont waste your time and money 
Had to wait for a long to hear from a waiter

name: Ugadi
review:
I visited the marathalli branch its pretty good With just 300 bucks 2 people can have sufficient food courtesy to its authentic andhra meal unlimited at just rs150
I was already liking it while eating and it went higher on seeing the bill with no additional taxes

name: Ugadi
review: Tried gongura mutton Biryani in marathalli branch its was too good and prawns Biryani is not so good They need to improvise serving time other wise its good hotel

name: Ugadi
review:
Good variety of ethnic Andhra cuisine I tried a variety of biriyani and fried rice with nattu kori Curry and other curries Delicious food Good service
The location is not much accessible or not much persons known any this place Hence little rush experienced during lunch time
But good recipes they serving

name: Ugadi
review: Today we went for lunch Very bad experience Took nearly 15minutes to serve water Fried rice and baby corn horrible to the core No salt or nothing Kindly take care of your service else it will spoil your brand name for sure

name: Ugadi
review:
This place is good for Andhra style meals
A fine priced menu and a decent atmosphere
The Andhra style cooked biryani is a must have
Disappointing as at peak hours the service is a lil slow

name: Ugadi
review:
We had been to this restaurant on a Sunday afternoon The restaurant was full The restaurant staff seemed overwhelmed by the number of people to be served

The service was bad we had to ask more than five times for water They took 15 minutes to take the order The server was not even aware what he was serving us and seemed confused The food was decent We ordered boneless chicken biryani  the boneless chicken was served separately from the biryani and veg dum biryani both were decent

Overall average restaurant with poor service

name: Ugadi
review: Had a sumptuous food here Fab taste is all cuisine  Excellent ambience and service  Had Andhra Style Foods Overall it was great to have food in UGADI

review: There are better andhra restaurants at the same price i had bed Spencerian here  they serve very less quantity  poor service  and i dont want to tell about there hygiene there are better places in bangalore where you get authentic andhra food Its my worst experience

name: Ugadi
review:
I felt bad experience here  food wasnt good not hygienic they use tasting powder and color we ordered one plate of chicken masala   that chicken wasnt boiled properly  there are better places in bangalore where you get authentic andhra food
I never go back this restaurant

name: Ugadi
review: Ugadi special kabab was goodbiryani was overtly spicyhad to order curd rice to put that fire outaverage restaurant nothing greatservice is quick

name: Ugadi
review:
In and around Jayanagar if you are looking for tasty non vegetarian and vegetarian food Ugadi is one among them I had been to this place for dinner and enjoyed it Must try dishes are golden prawns lemon chicken chicken biryani Ugadi special Mutton starter to name a few
Taste  455
Ambience  45
Cost  4 5
Hygiene  355
Service  45

name: Ugadi
review: I ordered for veg meals from Ugadi via the OLA CAFE app It costed only Rs 99 but every item in the meal was finger licking delicious Firstly the rice was steaming hot and cooked to perfection There was enough rice for 2 adults The side dishes included beetroot poriyal dal with greens kolambu sambar and rasam Each of these was too tasty And to finish it off the payasam was yummy

name: Ugadi
review:
The other day we went for shopping to JayaNagar and its lunch time  My friend introduced this nice place Ugadi restaurant The name itself sound pretty ethnic and gives positive vibes  

We ordered for Parotta and 1 paneer curry for me and 1 chicken curry for my friend The food tasted good and Im particularly impressed with the Parotta Its THE BEST in those Ive tasted in Bangalore so far  Its very crispy but surprisingly lot less oily  Here is the detailed rating

1 Location  255 They stay in a small lane thank God I didnt bring my car on that day
2 Ambiance  355
3 Food taste  45
4 Serve quantity  355
5 Service  45

Overall rating  355 Location has severely impacted the overall rating

name: Ugadi
review:
Let me list the good points I found in this restaurant first
Food ambience service
And now for the not so good points
Food ambience service
Dont be baffled by the same points listed but if youve been here youll know Theres something lacking in this restaurant foods delicious but far too spicy for a normal mans tummy to handle Ambience is peaceful and dim lit like any other resto but lil jam packed I was happy with the waiters service and how they recommend dishes but the time from the food ordered to arrival on my plate makes anyone go nuts with impatience I understand its Andhra style food but I really wish theyd cut down the spice level of their food so that everything else falls into place

name: Ugadi
review: An an alternative to the meghanas and nandhinis However the location is quite tricky The biriyanis will not let you down for sure As frequently mentioned the service has to improve

name: Ugadi
review: the worst experience i orderd first time thali it was ok but when i orderd second time i was cheated there were so many items was missinglike phulkasweetsand so many and apart from this 25 extra for deliveryvery expensivevery bad service

name: Ugadi
review: I guess they have recently started this place as I was out of bangalore for a month was craving for andhra meals someone suggested me this place to try out order for a Thali food was ok though not 100 andhra style but with thali they gave us Phulka it was real phulka  service was dam slow they need to improve a lot on service

review:
The other day we went for shopping to JayaNagar and its lunch time  My friend introduced this nice place Ugadi restaurant The name itself sound pretty ethnic and gives positive vibes  

We ordered for Parotta and 1 paneer curry for me and 1 chicken curry for my friend The food tasted good and Im particularly impressed with the Parotta Its THE BEST in those Ive tasted in Bangalore so far  Its very crispy but surprisingly lot less oily  Here is the detailed rating

1 Location  255 They stay in a small lane thank God I didnt bring my car on that day
2 Ambiance  355
3 Food taste  45
4 Serve quantity  355
5 Service  45

Overall rating  355 Location has severely impacted the overall rating

name: Ugadi
review:
Let me list the good points I found in this restaurant first
Food ambience service
And now for the not so good points
Food ambience service
Dont be baffled by the same points listed but if youve been here youll know Theres something lacking in this restaurant foods delicious but far too spicy for a normal mans tummy to handle Ambience is peaceful and dim lit like any other resto but lil jam packed I was happy with the waiters service and how they recommend dishes but the time from the food ordered to arrival on my plate makes anyone go nuts with impatience I understand its Andhra style food but I really wish theyd cut down the spice level of their food so that everything else falls into place

name: Ugadi
review: An an alternative to the meghanas and nandhinis However the location is quite tricky The biriyanis will not let you down for sure As frequently mentioned the service has to improve

name: Ugadi
review: the worst experience i orderd first time thali it was ok but when i orderd second time i was cheated there were so many items was missinglike phulkasweetsand so many and apart from this 25 extra for deliveryvery expensivevery bad service

name: Ugadi
review: I guess they have recently started this place as I was out of bangalore for a month was craving for andhra meals someone suggested me this place to try out order for a Thali food was ok though not 100 andhra style but with thali they gave us Phulka it was real phulka  service was dam slow they need to improve a lot on service

name: Ugadi
review: The first time I visited this place I had a good experience both ambience and food However with time the quality of food underwent a steady decline Since its a few yards away from my work I kept going back to this place in spite of average food The choices are minimal Even if you are hungry the taste kills the appetite Only the service is the saving grace here

name: Ugadi
review: The restaurant will give a treat to nonvegetarian tongues Being Andhra styled meals lack spice The ambience is average while people with asthma may die instantly because the place is tightly packed with no fresh air entering

name: Ugadi
review: Ambience is not at all nice Service is also not satisfied Still have to improve on those aspects Food is good Esp chicken majestic Is awesome Biryani is also goodveg thali is also nice

name: Ugadi
review: My wife wanted to have Andhra meal on her birthday and we chose this restaurant We ordered meal thinking they are going to serve us authentic andhra meal but it was disaster I never had such a bad tasting food so far in my life it was too much sour and without any taste Finally we came out with our stomach half filled I decided not to experiment and better stick to the restaurants we like

name: Ugadi
review:
The food here is just about an average neither its too good nor its bad
The starters taste needs a Lil improvement
Worth a try the service is good as well

name: Ugadi
review: Food taste is average We ordered gongura chickenordered for spicy specifically which turned out be a normal one Quantity of biryani is very less when compared to other restaurants like meghana krithunga etc Overall its expensive to taste authentic andhra food

name: Ugadi
review:
Tasty authentic food

Had been here while searching for a good authentic place to eat Its relatively
I ordered the unlimited meals and boy they were so much on the platter almost 12 or 15 different dishes served in small cups n 3 different kinds of sweets
A must visit if you are in jayanagar

The staff was courteous too since I only tried one dish I cannot vouch for others

name: Ugadi
review: Worst service Food quality n price inversely proportion  Needs to revamp the staff n cook  Would rate 1 on 10 First time walked without completing the food

name: Ugadi
review: I tried Andhra meals expecting Andhra relish  I am not satisfied with the savour more over the head waiters are too rash  The restaurant is expensive

name: Ugadi
review:
Well Mixed feelings First of all I believe that the owners were asleep midway because they couldnt even place the the direction boards correctly ended up walking two by lanes before reaching the restaurant

Being from Andhra myself I have quite expected a lot from this place and i must say that to my dismay all my expectations were shattered

The place was hardly inviting the interiors were basic  and it was terribly hot inside the air conditioning looked just like a prop without any function the waiters were simple folk just carrying on their chores 

Asked them to get a Special Biryani To my relief this biryani came to my rescue It was surprisingly well made It came with an accompanied chicken curry and it really tasted well This was the only positive feeling i had when i left this place
Probably wouldt return again

name: Ugadi
review: One fo the worst andhra food i have had in my life till now Its just waste of mobey going here the chapathi are very small that in two bites it gets over n everytime i asked chapathi he gets rice and tells sir rice i was pissed the way they were serving they were getting chapathis as if i have asked their kidney the rice is not of a good quality i have heavy gas in my stomach after i had food here and rasam was too much sour and it was full of tamrind and sambar was sweet then palya was just waste and dal was bland even i had put salt it was too bland One of the worst places so my recomendation is dont go here if u want andhra food

name: Ugadi
review: Great place for Andhra style food The chicken biriyani we had was the best we ever had The places can be easily found It can get a little clumpsy if you are visiting in the peak hours Nevertheless the wait is worth the food you eat

name: Ugadi
review: Wish i could rate lower And had a chance to have food After ordering meals and waiting for an hour the waiter tells us theres no rice Jaynagar has much better places Never come come here

review: The worst experience I have ever had is ordering a meal here They say unlimited and try to satisfy you for less The quality is really very very poor and service is totally bad

name: Ugadi
review:
A andhra restaurant  had meals over here
The ambience was pretty decent and the service was also good
The food was okay I couldnt say its good because I didnt feel anything great about the restaurant The food was not much spicy too It was spicy but not as expected
My rating will be 355

jayasuriyanwordpresscom

name: Ugadi
review:
This used to be quite good place and I have had wellcooked amazing biriyanis here However couple of my latest experiences have been not so good here not sure if they were few of those notsogood days

I bought their gongura chicken not on the menu custom made however it just was a weird dish The last two times I got Legpiece biriyani the legpieces had lot of fat on it and was nearly raw from inside making it inedible These two experiences have convinced me to keep away from this restaurant for a while Hope you improve

name: Ugadi
review:
Ugadi is undoubtedly one of my favourite restaurants in the Jayanagar 4th blk area They serve authentic food and I personally like the service of the place as well The ambience is calm neat and the staffs are well organized It can get a little clumpsy if you are visiting in the peak hours Nevertheless the wait is worth the food you eat 
Definitely a goagain place for me

name: Ugadi
review:
This was an unplanned visit Was near BDA complex on a weekend during lunch time  happened to see this place Not much full on a saturday lunch time too 
Pathaga bhojanam thats what they call meals was average for the price not very good
Fried chicken piece biriyani was something new for me in the menu  tried it Didnt find a fried chicken piece inside it It came like jeera rice with chicken piece and masala But was tasting good

Decent seating  good ambience Not heavy on pocket

name: Ugadi
review:
Ugadi is one of my favorite restaurants for Andhra Style Food I am going here from very long time for authentic meals We cant compare this restaurant with any other Andhra Style restaurants
Food quality and taste is entirely different here but trust me this is a best place to go with family
My all time favorite is Veg Biryani and Andhra Style Meal here
One of the other best part is Ambiance and hygiene They maintained the restaurant very neatly and we should appreciate the Management for that
Overall
Quality 45
Taste 45
Ambiance 45
VFM 45

name: Ugadi
review:
I have only been there once and that day was one of the busiest day I can imagine it was the fleet week The wait time was like 20 minutes The seats are all taken by customers Good thing is that people eat fast

I like the Biryani is really good with sharwa and the lemon chicken was perfect

name: Ugadi
review: Worst andhra thali we have ever had Pappu which is a signature dish of andhra was pathetic to say the least Definitely over priced for the taste and ambience Will never visit again

name: Ugadi
review: Pls do not go after 9 pm and order a thalias it turns out all the gravies and dal will be inadequate to one person and their response to this will be mind blowing

review: I visted first time for restaurant and surprised after eating the food and briyani is like my hometown food and ve is parking you can search in other places

name: Ugadi
review:
I had a chance to taste the Paneer 65 made here and it is marvellous guys Yup actually this happend when I ordered up on phone for delivery to my area The next thing I tasted from here was there veg fried riceNothing specialits the common oneI would like to complain over the quantity they give for such prices Its very lowIts true What tastes good comes in less quantity On the other hand fried rice was so much that I junked little to my wastebox


PS Other thing is that the taste doesnt seem as bad as some reviews say Ahah
Still they took one single hour deliver the order 
Dont forget Paneer 65 is a must try if youre a Southee No offense Northees P

name: Ugadi
review: Amazing chicken fry and mutton fry biryani The place is located not far from the main road Good ambience Amazing hospitality I bought 5 chicken fry and 1 mutton fry biryani This is my first time I ever heard or tasted this type of biryani Amazing texture and taste The rice was long The meat was tender The meat is cushioned in between the ghee rice Abundance amount of Masala I would definitely recommend anyone to tried their fried biryani I would soon put up the recipe of my own version of fried biryani on my website wwwsthenancom

name: Ugadi
review: Ordered Andhra style prawnsKheema ballsFish fry and andhra style carrier meals from UgadiCarrier meals is worth the money u payTaste is gudquantity is sufficient for family of 4Prawns was tender but taste was not goodkheema balls WHR fried too Much and was spicytaste needs improvementFish fry was smelling taste was not goodUgadi being a new restaurant u need to improve a lot to get new customersDefinitely I am not coming back

name: Ugadi
review: When one thinks Andhra food is always thought of as highly spiced and Ugadi takes it into consideration while preparing the dishesWe had ordered food and requested for a delivery at our office the food was delivered bang on the requested timeThe food tasted excellent and the overall experience was very satisfying

This is the place you go to eat great Andhra style food ambiance is okay for the class of the hotel service is pretty quick I ordered the Pandaga Bojanam is was simply good with its authentic food taste Also tried Chicken 555 spicy but yummy

End note dont miss this place

name: Ugadi
review:
I was at this restaurant last weekend the food was served 45 minutes after the order  i was there at 130 PM that is like the exact time for lunch but still the delay took place the food tasted very bad and i think i should use the word WORST
i am from andhraguntur and was expecting very simple andhra food and they failed to stand upto my minimum expectation
please dont choose this restaurant or dont get dismayed by the rating its just waste of money
I suggest Nagarjuna as a far better place 
MY WEEKEND WAS JUST RUINED

name: Ugadi
review: Most delicious Andra style food I have eaten over a long timekeep it up guys

name: Ugadi
review: great taste fast servicecool ambience nice staffs  must visit

name: Ugadi
review:
Went to this place for dinner today wednesday night it was not that crowded and place clean and a the manager pleasantly welcomed us We took some time to pick our food because the menu choice is vast Finally we ordered one meals because we read good reviews of the meals and we one mutton biryani and chicken lollipop

Meals was exceptional almost matched the hype lot of items and best part was felt like home cooked food Biryani was good it was not like other hotels little different only thing was not that spicy but good enough Lollipops was too good spicy and crispy as I wanted

Overall 40
Food 45
Ambiance 35
Service 40

name: Ugadi
review: They have only 23 chicken prepared dishes which they try to pass off as every dish on the menu We ordered pepper chicken and were served manchurian which the waiter assured us was pepper chicken The people at the table next to us ordered chicken wings and the staff tried to pass off chicken lollipop as wings They also argued with her that that was what she had ordered Finally they acknowledged that they didnt have chicken wings The people at the table on our other side ordered chicken kabab and guess what Yup they got manchurian too and were assured that it was kabab The ugadi special chicken is to be avoided at all costs It tasted like a mix of all the gravies left over from the previous day The hotel also uses frozen chicken which is barely thawed out in the dishes the serve Avoid this hotel

name: Ugadi
review: Went in today for lunch place is bit crowded but the food is really good Fry piece biryani was really good

name: Ugadi
review: Just had food and giving feedback from table These guys are useless to serve even buttermilk Dont waste time and money

name: Ugadi
review:
We had visited this place for our team lunch total 6 friends one friend complained veg food was not spicy enough but I dont care the all the food I tasted was amazing specially the RR Chicken and the Fry piece binary

Place for spicy food great choice of biryanis

Place for spicy food great choice of biryanis

name: Ugadi
review: Good food tried Ugadi special chicken Fried rice really really good Also tried crab fry which was okay go here for some spicy food

name: Ugadi
review:
I was here on a thursday afternoon around 1pm place dry not many people we were seated in corner with the next 3040mins when we were there place was packed Suggestion go early

Food was awesome me and I friend tried biryanis Chicken Dum and Fry Piece Biryani both were really yummy And also we order Fish fry which also good A place you should try

name: Ugadi
review: Very nice place great food and good service I had the meals it was very good much better than other places in this space Also tried the Chapala Pulusu Fish curry this was simple awesome perfect home made tangy taste Will go back here for the fish curry

name: Ugadi
review:
Everyday me and other coworkers used to argue on where we need to head out for lunch and I used to insist we go to Ugadi until the weekend that went by I am unsure if the management has changed or whatsoever the reason is this time I was totally disappointed to an extent that I will never visit the place again nor would I recommend anyone

As usual we ordered thaliwhich they are known for The food was cold the table cloth and the floor was extremely dirty The biggest spoiler was the service wherein the quantity that was served was so little and the waiter did not ask us if it was enough forget about coming back asking for more I would never go back here again mainly because when I complained to the manager he bluntly said IT HAPPENS Talk about service

name: Ugadi
review: Please dont go to this hotel I went with my friends we took ugadi unlimited food  they gave us plate meals but only thing rice was unlimited There is a old server he reacted as if we came for having free food

name: Ugadi
review: Service is just HORRIBLE in fact they dont know wat service meanswhen the owners of the place can be SO rude you cant expect much from stafffood quality and taste has gone BAD and the place is really DIRTY weekendsmy friends n I are never going back to this PATHETIC placeI rate them zero

name: Ugadi
review: Very nice food good taste Supreme chicken is awesome and Keema Biryani is also good Only thing is place is a bit crowded but worth the wait

name: Ugadi
review: great authentic andhra food i tried the fry piece biryani it is very yummy and good people

name: Ugadi
review: Awesome food it just reminded so much of home food this place is one of the place where you can find taste of home food I had the Thali I felt it was one the health homely food but at a restaurant All the items in the Thali were fresh and good except the rice bath was okay I guess thats okay This is know a place for my regular lunches

name: Ugadi
review:
Hi all this my first review on zomato and also found this place on zomato it was hard to locate this place with the address especially if you are not familiar with area landmark is next to universal academy and diagonal opposite lane of cool joint Hope this tips helps others to find this place easily

I went to this place today Saturday for dinner with my wife we got the seating pretty much immediately we placed an order for Keema Biryani Chicken Fry Piece Biryani and Chicken Ghutan I would say all of them were so different I never had a anything like Keema and Biryani it more like fusion of Biryani we did not try the traditional style biryani they have but these were so good if you are person like me who dont like the chicken pieces in a regular biryani the this Fry Piece Biryani is for you guys chicken ghutan was good too

Overall a place with choice of different style of food with traditional Andhra food

name: Ugadi
review: Had chicken biriyani which is too saltish and belowaverage taste Veg biriyani which my friend had is tastless on top layer saltish in next layer and spicy at the end indicating its not not properly mixed please change the recepie to make items atleast eatable

review: Very nice food good taste Supreme chicken is awesome and Keema Biryani is also good Only thing is place is a bit crowded but worth the wait

name: Ugadi
review:
I went to this place on Thursday after noon with one other friend place is nice to see and people were very friendly than what others are saying may it was not as busy on this day

We ordered Pandaga bojanam Festival meal in Telugu I would say it was the perfect Andhra meals I have ever eaten quantity was more than one can eat and really tasty food We also ordered Chicken Supreme which was not on the menu suggested by the waiter it is spicy but delicious

Great Food dont miss it

name: Ugadi
review: The food taste is good and authentic Andhra style But they need to improve on service part They should know that even after they take the order once still some service might be required We had placed for an order once and just wanted to add a few more items but there was none seeing our requirements And the seating capacity is very less but having said that that doesnt mean that on a table of four there will be 2 people on one side and two more on the other side which made me uncomfotable So my suggestion to foodies is just go in to this hotel when there are 4 people or probably you might have to share the table with some strangers

name: Ugadi
review: my sister treated my whole family in ugadi on Sunday afternoon v made a reservation but as we entered we realized that it was a complete waste the restaurant was fully packed thankfully v got a table as soon as we entered the place luks congested especially on weekends coz its swarming with ppl the waiters serve in haphazard manner nd keep on dropping spoons dey clear the table even before our food has been served fully we got our biryani but not raita until we finished our lunch in spite of all these shortcomings I can tell you that the food was amazing biryani was average but the soup hot n sour and starters steal the show yummy food my mouth waters just by thinking abt it I don care abt the service this is the oly place I would visit again despite the bad service just for the food it serves amazing

name: Ugadi
review: Today my friend given treat in ugadi restaurent The food was so tasty especially prawn biryanichicken frypit biryanichicken startersprawn starters and even chicken hot and sour soup I think people who likes to have spicy food can prefer ugadi restaurent

name: Ugadi
review:
I went to this place on Thursday after noon with one other friend place is nice to see and people were very friendly than what others are saying may it was not as busy on this day

We ordered Pandaga bojanam Festival meal in Telugu I would say it was the perfect Andhra meals I have ever eaten quantity was more than one can eat and really tasty food We also ordered Chicken Supreme which was not on the menu suggested by the waiter it is spicy but delicious

Cheers

name: Ugadi
review: After alot of research done on zomato regarding selection of restaurants we selected UGADU for having dinnerAs soon i entered this place i felt amazing about itFirst of all nice location in jayanagarIts a fabulous restaurant with nice seating area and very nice ambienceLet me start with the starterStarter taste wise was very tasty and very niceNicely cooked and servedMoving on to the main courseI cant describe how good it isIt was amazing and very niceThe staff members are very helpful and nicei would love to visit this place again and again

name: Ugadi
review: Best Andhra food i have ever tasted in bangalore good ambience service and good food

name: Ugadi
review:
On a leisurely Sunday we made our way to this restaurant tucked admits the buzzing shoppers As we entiredwe were greeted by the friendly staffsand the ambience was just right
Few minutes past lunch timethe cozy restaurant was packed As for the foodwe ordered chicken biryaniunlimited meals and a veg dum biryani For an affordable price we were treated to plenty
Butas far as the taste goesmy family were satisfied with the chicken biryanionly if it were not bland it wouldve been just great Meals were again a hit with my family as it was served as authentic andhra style Being a vegetarian I ordered veg dum biryani which was a huge let downas it was not only bland but not worth the price
Overallugadi is a restaurant that should be tried once in a while if your not a spicy foodie

name: Ugadi
review:
Worst Andhra meals I have had Everything was bad
Avoid

name: Ugadi
review:
Very nice neet place and lovely food
Cheers

name: Ugadi
review: This place is hidden gem of andhra style food in jayanagar very close to hot chips and next to universal academy me and my friend went there and we ordered one Andhra meals my god best meal for the price unlimited everything and great taste too and also the waiter suggested us order Fry piece biryani initially the fist look gave us this a biryani but the taste was great and spicy Friendly staff looks like a family run business

name: Sri Krishna Sweets
review: perfect mysurpa

name: Sri Krishna Sweets
review: Their mysurpa just melts in mouth They can come out with more variety of sweetsAbout other sweets just the same when compared to others like kaju katli

name: Sri Krishna Sweets
review:
So everybody likes their mysore pak what about other sweets They deserve love too
They claim to be a part of Sri Krishna sweets Chennai group Almost all of the famous items are available I tasted badam halwa and it was good a bit too sweet for my liking I also tasted their famed kai muruku  tasted good but was not fresh

name: Sri Krishna Sweets
review:
After listening to lots of praises of the mysore pak here We decided to visit once And on our visit we realized the Praises are truly worthy Simply Superb no other words Mysore pak is a rich sweet dish prepared in Ghee from Southern India usually served as dessert It originated in Mysore It is made of generous amounts of ghee sugar gram flour and often cardamom The texture of this sweet is similar to fudge 
Read full post on roamingrutawordpresscom

name: Sri Krishna Sweets
review:
An epic and unidentified gem of place in the heart of Basavanagudi and synonym for Mysore Pak and Fried Cashews There are many popular sweet shops for Mysore Pak still this place is best The Mysore Pak just melts in your mouth The old Bangaloreans will definitely sentient about this place Well the prices are damn expensive but praiseworthy Fried Cashews are something everyone should try along with sweets They have very less options the menu without any fancy ones

Mysore Pak over here has got a great texture with loads of ghee and aroma takes you out of the world

bangaloreepicurecom

name: Sri Krishna Sweets
review: Their Mysorepaks are the best i have ever had even though cost is on the higher side Mysorepak from here is a must whenever i go to Gandhi Bazar

name: Sri Krishna Sweets
review:
Wont Say much here as you need to experience the first hand
Mysore pak  Ghee ghee everywhere  and Cashew Burfi Gimme these two and I am engrossed in this

name: In Time Cane Juice
review: The quality and quantity are on par with caneola Pocket friendly place for students Quick service though crowded during college timings

name: In Time Cane Juice
review:
Chilled sugarcane juice in hot bangalore

This is one of the few outlets who provide sugarcane juice

Apt prices Large glass costs 25

One good thing is they keep the canes in freezer rather than adding ice cubes in juice later

instagramcom

name: In Time Cane Juice
review: Its a blessing in disguise to have sugar cane outlet in ks layout I must say they opened the juice CENTER in time for general public Sugar cane outlets are rare to find in ks layout

name: Subway
review:
Food  810
Service  810
Ambience  810

Subs here is good same like other places Sometimes they are out of some breads Staff here is polite and good in their job Ambience is well lit and clean with some light music Overall it was a good experience here

name: Subway
review:
I have visited this place multiple times its like just any other Subway Nothing too great
The reason Im rating this place 15 is because I ordered food from this Subway outlet on Foodpanda Waited for more than 30 mins and the restaurant did not confirm the order When I called them they were like they werent accepting orders from Foodpanda and asked me to speak with Foodpanda customer care When I spoke with Foodpanda customer care they told me the restaurant doesnt want to accept the order Finally my order was cancelled
If they werent accepting orders from Foodpanda then they should have turned the order accepting device off The person with whom I spoke with over the phone was very rude and not one bit apologetic

name: Daal Roti
review: good

name: Daal Roti
review: This place is a daily mess and best suited for students or bachelors I will give a big zero to their cleanliness and service They even charge you for onion The price on the menu card is not updated which is really unethical What they serve you when you go and and eat and when you order online is quite different I was so impressed with their taste I ordered the food online that I decided to visit this place and I was very disappointed with their service

name: Daal Roti
review: This is the worst of all restaurant one can ever come across Once I had asked for a home delivery  literally these people made me wait for two and half hours and then said that they are unable to deliver The food quality used to be decent earlier but now has degraded  The place is also very unclean and you can always expect rude behaviour from the staff

name: Daal Roti
review: I have been going to this place for a very long time now And i have seen this place change overtime Earlier things were not that good but now i think they might have changed the cooks or something as food tastes better This place is best to satisfy ur north indian food cravings Dishes are little pricey for a small place like this It is best for takeaways as u wont be able to eat over here because of the mosquitos To be on the safe side always order regular dishes and stay away from unique dishes as most of them are horrible If u live somewhere nearby and want to have something north indian u can give this place a try

name: Daal Roti
review: An average place to eat at if youre having food out on a daily basis Save money and fill your tummy Quality and hygiene issue people do not visit

name: Daal Roti
review: I have been to a this place almost a year back and now i am a regular to this place since then  The best to satisfy your North Indian cravings Would deffinetely suggest this place

name: Daal Roti
review: Awesome food service is fast they have changed the taste gave the restaurant awhole new look very yummy food the food was also served at Time within 5 minutes of the order was placed

name: Daal Roti
review:
Awesome foodmust try veg mumtazveg malaiveg hariyali introduced recently in the menu and trust me its really deliciouswell cooked and very nicely presented
Other than the special items chinese cuisines are also good litti chokha is also available occasionally and on customer demand which is very homely must visit to have North Indian flavours under one roof

name: Daal Roti
review:
ordered  for white rice and chicken curry  they took 20 minutes to serve  rice was very cold its like take out of fridge  and chicken curry some kind of disgusting  rotten smell  no one cant eat 1 spoon also  walked out imminently    worst food  worst service 

ambiance 15
food 05
Final verdict  hospital guaranty

name: Daal Roti
review:
The worst restaurant i have ever visited in kumaraswammy layout They take a lot of time to serve your order
And then quiet expensive

name: Daal Roti
review: The place is small not a great place to hang out but yeah the food is too good specially chicken items and the people are friendly not even too costly overall its good

name: Daal Roti
review: The worst place to order from hereThey will never deliver on time and always say someone else took the order and he has left the shop so please repeat the orderIf one wants to starve than can order from here

name: Daal Roti
review: I got my food delivered home from daal roti Food will take ages to get delivered Ordered at 1030 and it got delivered at 12 30 The food was warm kind of tasty I ordered chicken kassa and 4 roti combo egg curry and 4 rotti combo

name: Daal Roti
review:
I will say a nice place with tasty Chinese flavour Nonveg isnt halal so was not able to taste but the veg served was good
Price is bit high based on the quantity and ambience
Overall a good food served

name: Daal Roti
review:
I would so a ok kind of place to give it a try
Food tastes yummyThe only problem which i feel to be concerned is hygieneAs i found this place can be maintained properly in a tidy manner
Service is good
Must Try  Noodles and other Chinese items

name: Daal Roti
review: I eat here often and I always go for the rice thali The food here is good in terms of quality and quantity Spacious seating and quick serving of the food is an added advantage College students are a regular crowd there I would recommend this place for the working people who come after a long tiring day and dont want to cook yet want quality and quantity food Price is pocket friendly and food is worth the price

name: Daal Roti
review: I have been a regular customer for over a year Started with just one room now they have large space definitely doing good business Vegetarian food are good Nonvegetarian food are average The only bad thing about this place is customer service When I tried to give feedback about the food they were not ready listen Home delivery is worst I stay nearly 100 meters away from this restaurant Every time I have to explain where I stay It was frustrating

name: The Lassi Park
review: This is like home for me Always love going here late nite Love d kulfi the falooda  brownie sizzler Even d sundae r equally good u should try every variety every time u visit  Lots to explore

name: The Lassi Park
review: A review after being here number of times Amazing lassies infact n looks like iv tried almost everything in their menu except for their faloodas cs I don like them anywhere Chocolate sizzler is a must try n love the fruit salad with ice creamsimple n niceLove to this place always

name: The Lassi Park
review: This place is always buzzing with people and is associated with a lot of fond memories This is one the little gems of Jayanagar Their falooda is one of the best in Bangalore Falooda kulfi is my favourite Royal falooda comes a close second The lassi is another must try item Its the best place to beat the heat Frequenting them on a Sunday afternoon has become a regular affair

name: The Lassi Park
review: So this is like place we go after belting high on hari super sandwich as this place right opposite to it Love their hot chocolate fudge sizzlerAlways refreshing to come back to this place for some desserts If you are around do visit

name: The Lassi Park
review:
A very busy and crowded place in jayanagar Had been here to try out some drinks
They have many options in their menu Juice shake smoothie falooda etc
Ordered Lichi Shake It was really delicious Perfect chilled and sweetness Usually in other places shakes will be full of ice and too much sweet But this shake was perfect Loved it
Definitely gonna try out other options as well

name: The Lassi Park
review: My alltym fav placeThey serve Desi style of icreams n faloooddaaaaaaasBeen here a million timesFalooodaas and fruit salad with ice creams are the best and yymmmmyyy

name: The Lassi Park
review:
Located right opposite to Hari Super Sandwich after gulping down all my favorites from there I had to quench my thirst
Most of the time I order for Watermelon without sugar and without ice thats when you can truly taste the fruit for itself Usually I get disappointed but not here
The juice was so FRESH and GOOD I felt healthy after drinking that Haha
And the best part is its at a very affordable price

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review: Delicious mouthwatering Would be great if you provide us with more pastry options

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review: There werent enough sugar packs for bulk coffee order

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review: Very bad Pathetic exp

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review: Lovely place and locality to hangout with friends and family Had been with friends late night and tried out Tropical iceberg Was so good for a late night order

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review: leaked food

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review: it was nice and fast delivery

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review: The staff here are a little rude You are not allowed to complain to them  They need to start serving food faster The coffee is splendid but you will have to wait for a very long time for your coffee

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review:
Cafe Coffee Day
A place to end up for typical Coffee culture in the locality since years CCD has made a very good name in Taste and Quality They have their own standards in delivering the product There are several outlets in the area this is 8th block one located opp to Vasudev Adigas Restaurant

They had International Burger Festival  going on but I just headed to try cup of hot coffee
Ordered Vanilla Cafe Latte which was milk based They hardly took 15 min to serve Had ordered for King sized
Vanilla Cafe Latte is something refreshing with vanilla cream and flavour on it

Good and plesent place to sit back and relax for the cup of coffee Outlet was clean and welcoming

Food  45
Hospitality  45
Cleanliness  355
Service  45
Value for money  355

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review: As it says a lot can happen over a coffee it was raining outside so I order for hot king cappuccino  my frd order for green Apple tea tawa pizza it was good

name: Cafe Coffee Day
review:
Wow Im the first one to review this specific Cafe Coffee Day I wonder why there are no reviews yet since this happens to be one of the better CCD branches

Me and an old friend usually meet up here first before we go elsewhere to have a couple of beverages This CCD has been out point for contact for a year now and it was him who introduced me to it It has good outer seating and the umbrellas above the tables provide a nice little touch

The menu is the same as other CCDs so I wont really go into too much detail Strawberry Pom Smoothie Cool Blue Crunchy Frappe and Classic Lemonade are my favourites As always its slightly overpriced The service is pretty good though

Consider dropping in here if youre around the area

Food  355
Ambiance  455
Service  45
Value for money  355
Hygiene  45
Overall  45

name: A2B - Adyar Ananda Bhavan
review: Stopped by during our travel This place serves the best sambar No matter which dish i order i make sure i order their sambar with it All time favorite

name: A2B - Adyar Ananda Bhavan
review: Location is right on target and this restaurant caters to fast eaters The major chunk of people opt for self service which is faster Try the dosas which come with a range of accompaniments Good spread but the North Indian and Chinese items might take a wee bit longer

name: A2B - Adyar Ananda Bhavan
review: We stopped her for a good breakfast so that our journey can be resumed and my god what delicacy they served us Our stomachs were so happy after having meal here and I would love to stop here in future as well

name: Srikrishna Bhavan
review:
Sri Krishna bhavan is the best hotel in Bangalore which is situated in banashankari
The taste of the food is very nice
And the ambiance is very good
Love this place

name: Timepass Dinner
review:
Food 35
Ambience 35
Service 35

Had been here for family lunch This place serves buffets too We ordered soups babycorn starters butter naan kadai panner veg kohlapuri pease pulav Food was good But the service is too slow They will make you wait for 20 mins to get the order This place is apt for family hangout

Cheers

name: Green Gardenia
review:
Have been here multiple times For one the place is close to my home in Bangalore Two because of the variety of food they offer not to mention the taste and quantity
Its a veggie place Some good options to choose from particularly in main course If you are in the padmanabhanagar area this restaurant is a must visit

My verdict

Ambience 35
Taste355
Value for money355

name: J Spice
review: Place was kinda ok ambience wise food was also fine we had ordered butter chicken dont exactly taste like it but was palatable kinda reasonable too

name: J Spice
review:
Food  45
Price  High
Best place to party Price of liquor is cheap compared to food

Yes must visit
Best place to visit for dinner with some drinks

name: Karavali Family Restaurant
review: We are literally hungry just went inside to have a lunch  we got a menu so we placed order for chicken biryani and south India meals food is very delicious  service is very good and staff are very friendly  we enjoyed our meal and coming to ambience nothing much to say about it one more resto for bucket list

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: Good Food  Prompt service  To improve the Ambience    We had Chicken Biriyani   Silver Fish Fry  Egg masala   Not very expensive   Home delivery to be extended to Commercial street  around that place

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review:
I am in love of the food this restaurant brings to the table The first thing that comes to my mind is WoW I ordered Bangada Masala fry which was cooked so tenderly Then the chicken sukka reminded me of my native This food will show you flashbacks if you are a mangalorean Everything is connected very well

Food 455
Service 355 Food is fresh so it takes time to prepare
Quality 45
Quantity 455
Quality  Quantity to Price Ratio  45

All in all this place is epic A must visit if you have a craving for seafood

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review:
My friend refer me this hotel We tried neer dosa n egg curry That EGG curry was just amazing I never tasted egg dish in this flavour must try for egg lovers
4star because dosa was not hot

review: We ordered boiled rice but they send plane rice

review: excellent coastal food

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: Superb food

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review:
Timely delivery and authentic Mangalore style food
Ordered bangda fry and egg curry both were hot and delicious Will try more dishes soon

review: chatni wasnt therechatni should be given with neer dosa

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: awesome taste and content also high I love it

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: Very nice food Authentic Mangalore taste

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: food is good  but the they have given white rice in place boiled rice

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: liked the food fish was yummy

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review:
I would give this place 500 stars if I could The food is just so damn tasty that I cant even think of a word that would do justice to its awesomeness
One suggestion go for Sea Food only the Mangalorean cuisine is famous for that not chicken
I order Prawn Ghee Roast with Neer Dosa and an Anjal Fish Rawa Tawa as a side
You can also go for Bangda that is also a very tasty fish
Stuff like Neer Dosa 3 per potion Boiled Rice and White Rice come with Meen Saar Fish Curry which is very very good
It is a must visit place

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review:
Must try  chicken ghee roast Kundapura chicken with neer dosa egg bhurji prawns squid Sukka
For all sea food lovers Value for money

Tried almost all items This is my first preference for sea food delicacies And I would like to recommend to everyone

The owner is also friendly and they deliver to places within 5 km

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: This is a small restaurant which full fills your non veg feast wit their great karavali style every dish here is tastefulchicken ghee roast and anjal Tawa fry is must try here overall the perfect joint for sea food and karavali dishes

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: Must try Briyani here There is something different the way they prepare Briyani its not a typical Briyani but taste very good I used to visit this place at least twice a week when I was in college Do give it a try Not a fancy place Just try this place for taste

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: Frequent visitor Best place to have sea food Must try anjal rava tava fry Chicken kabab bangada tava fry Pricing is very reasonable to the quality

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: In the hands of an able cook fish can become an inexhaustible source of perpetual delight and delight it truly was at this humble nofrills eatery that serves in coastal mangalorean cuisine A hearty fish meal that included BangdaIndian Mackerel fry Anjal Seer Fish fry Mathi Sardine fry Neer Dosa and Gassi Biryani and butter milk to wash them down My top picks are the Anjal and Bangda along with the biriyani Im not a sardines person but my friend absolutely enjoyed it At 300 bucks per person this is absolute value for money Thanks Vinayak J Prabhu for taking me to this wonderful place Im gonna come back for more

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: My favourite go to place when I want to eat sea food in a simple ambience and dont want to pay a lot of money to enjoy the food  The fish thali is decently priced but I love the prawn sukka  Must try

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: This hotel is run by natives of kundapura Good coastal food Especially fishes All items are cooked in proper kundapur style Reasonable price

name: Karavali Lunch Home
review: Good choice for the coastal people The food is good worth for the value Specially for coastal  fish eating people Even you can order from home  its free home delivery

name: Hatti Kaapi
review: Happened to visit this place after having breakfast elsewhere on a Saturday morning Its your basic coffeetea stall A bit on the pricy side when compared to your normal Darshinis but the the coffee and lemon tea we had were good Quick service

name: Hatti Kaapi
review:
Ambience  35    Food  45  Service  45  VFM  45  Parking  No

Hatti Kaapi is a chain of coffee kiosks at various locations in Bangalore We visited the Jayanagar branch one Sunday morning after a hearty breakfast of idli at a nearby place
We ordered the regular filter coffee and a Mysuru coffee The filter coffee was strong and made just right and managed to satisfy my wife who has pretty high standards for it I too loved the Mysuru coffee and would surely recommend the same
They also serve light snacks to go with the coffee which we left for another visit

name: Hatti Kaapi
review: Here you can find different types of coffee and snacks the place is quite nice best place for evening hangouts in Jayanagar this is in front of Jayanagar 3rd block police station

name: Hatti Kaapi
review:
Easy on the pocket and Best Filter Kaapi Ive had in Bangalore Badam Milk was good too

They also offer other items on their menu including Samosas and Banana Cakes Nice place to hang out during breaks

name: Hatti Kaapi
review:
Hatti Kaapi is a chain restaurant that serves a variety of South Indian snacks and coffee This outlet is a very small one located at Brigade road The location is excellent and the snacks are tasty I have visited this place twice and had their Mini Idli Regular Idli Sambhar Hazelnut Cold Coffee and Filter Coffee
Their Mini Idli is very good and so is the Hazelnut coffee Its a self service outlet and their is no place to sit so you will have to stand

name: Hatti Kaapi
review:
Food  305

Ambience  205

Service  305

Can Try  Filter coffee

Clue  Coffee was good Bisi Bele Baath was tasting good and served hot but needs improvement in quality and freshness

name: Kolkata Kathi Roll's
review: Good place nice taste and finally stomach filling items with reasonable price and the staff are friendly and helpful customization available If your choice is rolls them you just definitely go to this place

name: Kolkata Kathi Roll's
review: Pocket friendly good quantity and taste No question of ambience and service here Its more of a takeaway or delivery kind of place Mostly meant for students

name: Kolkata Kathi Roll's
review: Love their egg paneer rolls Place is too small Totally a budget place Dont expect too much Not too clean Might as well stand outside and eat But rolls being their forte theyre amazing Recommended

name: Kolkata Kathi Roll's
review:
I am a vegeterainans hence few choices to eat Tried all veggie choices Such kinda places are very worthy picket friendly And tasty too Worth trying

sakhiravoorwordpresscom

name: Kolkata Kathi Roll's
review: A pretty in the budget place I ordered a veg and a chicken roll They were good in quantity as well as taste though I liked the chicken one more

name: Kolkata Kathi Roll's
review:
Rolls are sort of your regular diet if you are a college student They are cheap quick meals 

This joint lets you check in both boxes And additionally the taste is also good The rolls arent too oily nor is there any overbearing taste of any sauce
We bought an egg chicken roll and a gobi rollSagar Kathrisal is pure veg

The egg coating on the roll was really fluffy and did not even a bit have the raw egg smell And the chicken was really juicy

Also please not this is not exactly a family restaurant Its more of a stop take and go kind of a place

As long as the food is tasty and easy on the pocket I am always happy

name: Kolkata Kathi Roll's
review: The place is meant for all sorts of eaters except families The quantity that you receive for the price is good and eve the taste is fine Mid you find the place too claustrophobic then just get it packed or get them to deliver at your place Whats best is you have them in food panda with good deals Well with the price they offer I really doubt if you need additional deals Try their egg chicken roll Youll not regret it

name: Upahara Darshini
review:
Scrumptious

Had been here for dinner Their Bharjari Oota menu looked inviting So all of us chose to try Bharjari Oota It was a right call Everything they served was so delicious It is a must try for hungry souls I loved their Masala Dosa which was a part of the oota Perfect foods You also get to end this lovely meal with an ice cream
Next time your around this place dont miss out

name: Upahara Darshini
review:
Located in basavanagudi we went for lunch on a weekday and opted for bharjari bojana its an unlimited for a price of Rs150 So good was served on banana leaf with water bottle provided

Soup
Tomato soup

Sweet
Kharjoora obattu it was the best 

Pineapple chutney kosambari corn salad and tondekai palya and fryums

Main course
1 Masala dosa  they were crisp and so yummy must try
2 Pulav  raita
3 Vegetable rice
4 White rice sambar and rasam
5 Curd rice

Desserts
Any choice of icecream

Best place till date in bangalore for unlimited meals  good ambience good taste and great value for money

Taste910
Ambience910
Value for money 1010

Overall experience 910

name: Upahara Darshini
review: We went for lunch It was too rush and we waited for 15mts and the wait is over Unlimited meals for lunch with unlimited masala dosa starts with sweet and ends with ice cream Quality service and ambiance is simply awesome over all good place for unlimited lunch for reasonable price

name: Upahara Darshini
review:
Lovely place in the side road Yummy idly and dosas
Road side parking Hygiene is well maintained Pricing is quite ok Poori Sagu was nice too
Perfect place for peaceful outing
