name: The Cafe Nuts and Bolts
review: Its really Awesome Place to chill and really awesome place to hangout with friendsfoods and hookah are available and value for money

name: The Cafe Nuts and Bolts
review: Great ambience Nuts n bolts  Awesome food specially chicken kebabs do try it delicious pastas  N courteous staffloved the placemust visit

name: AM WOW
review: Another small joint in Bylanes of Jayanagar 4th block they have only 2 items in their menu the famous Madurai Jigarthanda with and without icecream  By the look of the place we can observe that they do not prepare the jigarthanda there when enquired they said they get supply from SS Dairy foods which has made a very good name in Madurai jigarthanda shops in Madurai Taste is good one can have this after a good meal very soothing

name: AM WOW
review: the item was not chilling instead warm

name: AM WOW
review: Quantity is very very very less I wish to post a picture which I am not sure how to do

name: Lalbagh Grand
review: This is my destination on the morning and evening walk so became my breakfast  dinner place quite often during my  going on days in Basavanagudi the cultural heart of city I tasted here Rava Idly Khara bath Bonda soup tea raagi malt Everything was extremely good in taste more than expectation

name: Funjabi Curries
review: Kind of order I have received Uncooked and looked as if dough was days old which was used to make chapatis It was kind pf rotten smell coming from these

name: Funjabi Curries
review: I have ordered boneless curry And I ended up at a with bone curry and ended up throwing it away I have sent photos as proof to zomato chat support as required it So much for waiting for an hour only to discover food which I hadnt ordered

name: Funjabi Curries
review: got the order fromsome other hotel and the quatity is too less

name: Funjabi Curries
review: good taste

name: Funjabi Curries
review: best

name: Funjabi Curries
review:
ordered paratha and pickle combo didnt get picked and curd was spoiled 
there is not even a single piece of paneer in paneer Patiala  chef might have forgot to add paneer in gravy
very bad experience  never ever order food from this
 Funjabi curries   day started with very bad food

name: Eat Repeat
review:
This is a nofrills place in NR colony that serves yummy South Indian lunch at affordable prices Hygienic healthy and total VFM
Must have Sweet Pongal RiceMajjigehuli Puliyogare and Masala Majjige
The place is open only for lunch between 1130 am and 3 pm or until the food lasts and is a hit among the professorsteaching staff from the nearby APS college and people who would want to take away food note that you will have to carry your own boxes to take away food from here
My rating of this place

Taste 55
Ambience 35
Hygiene 55
VFM 55
Speed of Service 55
Overall 465 excellent

name: Eat Repeat
review:
Heard a lot about this restaurant and the food With expectation had been to this place on last Saturday at around 200 PM Place was Crowded  decent and especially more for takeway We have to collect tokens and go further inside to collect food Yes its a selfservice and few chairs are available to seat We ordered Puliogare chapatti with bhindi curry and sakkarai pongal
Puligare was some what balanced in spices and ok in taste But bhindi curry and chapatti are very disappointing too much of sweetness into curry and totally not good Even we felt high sweet in sakkarai pongal Even the people who serve food have lot of attitude issues while serving food

Food price is nominal and pocket friendly

Overall 25

Ambiance 255
 No dedicated seating arrangements Few round stools are available for seating
Food 25

Service 25

Price 355

Enjoy your food and make sure food is not wasted

sandeepkasalwordpresscom

name: Eat Repeat
review: I tried puliyogare and ambode And I like the puliyogare but ambode was a little cold one of the best authentic Iyengar hotels in Basavanagudi price is very cheap but the quality is good

name: Eat Repeat
review:
This place is unique for there authentic Brahmin food and taste Service at this place is quick staff is friendly and handle customers really well Menu is pocket friendly looks simple It is really hygienic tasty and healthy  must visit place around NR colonynear to Mahila mandali school
One suggestion would be  opening the restaurant around 9 clock would be good and ideal

name: Eat Repeat
review:
Just simple and Tasty  
Please do visit this place if you love to have homemadeBramhinIyengari style taste and food

I feel they planned the place very well in front of there own housecorrect me if i am wrong It is very close to NR Colony BusStop 

I didnot have food in this place but a take away First things firstLoved ther paintings Prices start from 5rs to 30rs Yes you read it correctly Visit the place to witness the same

I took Puliogare and Ambvode it was packed well I stay 10 minutes away from this place once i reached home and unpacked the food it was still fresh 

Coming to the taste Puliogare was spicytangy and good to taste Ambvode was not hard but good to taste it was fried in oil but it was not too oily 

I would love to taste there Sweet pongal and khara pongal

PS You can carry your boxes from home to pack food

sridhar1206blogspotcom

name: Eat Repeat
review:
This place is as authentic as it can be Its also very hygienic The staff are friendly and welcoming

Must try EVERYTHING ON THE MENU  trust me its worth it

The dishes are very reasonably priced with no compromise on the serving portions

Thanks to the restaurant to keep the authenticity and tradition of local cuisine alive

name: Eat Repeat
review: Okayish they have good variety on the menu also comes at affordable prices This outlet is small yet peaceful because of its location Homely foodNo filter coffee available

name: Eat Repeat
review:
Is a small place but has very attractive paintings on wall the food tastes very good  it feel like homemade food must try out food was Puliyogare
V get only few number of foods in the menu but with very good taste it as varieties of food like ambode sakare Pongal  Kara Pongal and nowadays they have introduced chapathis also  Maintains was very good and in polite way

name: Salut
review: The finger food is great and the yellow lit ambience is very calming The rooftop according to me is the best place to dine in The service is pretty fast with reasonable portions

name: Salut
review:
I had been been to Salut on a Saturday night with a friend The place was packed with only fee tables unoccupied
I checked out all the floors and found the rooftop as the best place to settle in

Salut is one of the best options available around to chill Its located near Jayanagar 4th block and is spread across three floors

Salut offers a variety of food and beverages but lack options for vegetarians

We ordered few beers along with peri peri french fries and pizza
The pizza could have been a lot better

Recommended for its ambience Will add more shortly
Cheers

name: Salut
review: Had been there to have quick bites with some beer The ambience is nice with well lit yellow lights The service is these best part  Also this place is attached to a mangalorean style restaurant hence the menu is predominantly based on Mangalore cuisine They have very limited number of starters Pizzas are great though  And post 730 they have an in house dj who plays good music

name: Salut
review: Was really impressed with the ambiance They have a large display screen and the vertical garden concept is very good Food is great Drinks are little over priced Try out this place if youre in and around south Bangalore

name: Salut
review:
We celebrated my friends birthday here and it was really fun

My order

Starters
1 French fries
Crispy fries and tasty dips Id rate it 1010

Mains
1 Veggie Bell pepper Pizza
I was very impressed with the size of the pizza It had a thin crust and everything was cooked very well They couldve added more vegetables but it was still a good dish Id rate it 910

2 Penne Alfredo
Delicious Both the pasta and sauce were cooked to perfection Again the quantity was worth the price Definitely give this dish a try

Drinks
Virgin Mojito and Kingfisher Beer Tower
I liked them both Former was refreshing and latter was good

Overall We all had a nice time at Salut The Pricing is on the average side and the staff is very friendly too

name: Salut
review:
My first experience wasnt great with regular fish lunch menu

This is my second
Good ambiance  Pub
Highly tasty prawn pudina ghee roast
Caribbean chicken rice

Keep up

name: Salut
review:
Ambience 910
Food 810
Drinks 810
Service 810

Salut means hi in French but also is a term used while drinking similar to cheers This restaurant embodies the word Salut The restaurant has alot of greenery which gives the whole place an outdoors and fresh vide It feels like an escape from the city when its in fact situated in the middle of Jayanagar The drinks and food is really good The pesto pizza and the wings are a perfect accompaniment for the beer and drinks Its a great place for a night out or just for a lazy Sunday Thier brownie is also delicious

I rate this restaurant a 810

name: Salut
review:
1st what I liked about this restaurant is their ambience and its a rooftop restaurant
Tried the cocktails daiquiri and Long Island ice tea both were perfect to taste
Had the corn cheese bites which was yummy too served with mayonnaise dip
And at last had the pesto pizza which was good with lots of veggies Although the slices were very thin we couldnt finish it fully
Would love to drop in again and try out the other items on the menu

name: Salut
review:
SO LOUD
Theres not even a dancefloor but the DJ plays loud obnoxious music in the dining area Its so loud one cant even hear the people at the same table The place is also uncomfortably small to be so loud We requested the staff to have the volume lowered but they flatly refused We couldnt even go through with placing the order

name: Salut
review:
We landed up at Salut this evening at 630pm for a quick swig The place is done up in the usual way of bars and pubs bang in the middle of Jayanagar 4th block Unfortunately there is a lot of incoming noise of the prevalent traffic

Only one other table was occupied We ordered a couple of beers salted peanuts and chicken strips They got the order wrong and got the chips instead Once the correct order came it was spicy contrary to what we had requested The chicken strips were tasty though The service in general seemed very mediocre

All in all it was an okay experience Will I go there again Maybe not I would definitely recommend they offer better service and attention to detail for the future

name: Salut
review: Its an average place  nothing much to talk about You can probably skip this place for the time being  and try other places which are well known

name: Salut
review:
Nice place to drink with friends wouldnt go there just for the food Ambience is great when they screen matches
Must have Stir fried prawns

name: Salut
review: As we were too early for a movie show we thought of kill some time in a pub and then came across this pubsituated in a very prime location of JaynagarAmbience is nice and DJ was playing some good old English classics For food we have ordered grilled pepper chicken which was very good taste wisewatermelon mocktail named as tarbooza was very average

name: Salut
review: Was really impressed with the ambience Food was great but the quantity is a bit less still worth it Open balcony  mild music is great too Fun place to have a pleasant dinner with family  friends

name: Salut
review: Was really impressed with the ambience Food was great but the quantity is a bit less still worth it Open balcony  mild music is great too Fun place to have a pleasant dinner with family  friends

name: Salut
review: Ambience is great and I like the starters most  it tastes very good  and should keep more drinks available alcohol its good to hangout there

name: Salut
review:
I have hopped almost all the places in jaynagar 
As I entered I was really impressed with the ambiance  they have a rooftop with a large display screen for all the sports lovers  I ordered some cocktails and they were well done but not so good
The food on the other hand was a huge disappointment

name: Salut
review:
As it is at the heart of Jayanagar I have been waiting to visit this place As I entered I was really impressed with the ambience They have a rooftop with a large display screen for all the sports lovers

I ordered a few cocktails and they were well done

The food on the other hand was a huge let down for me I ordered pork ribs egg ghee roast and chicken tawa fry The restaurant serves very less portion of food for the amount they charge The taste isnt so great and did not impress me much

All in all this restaurant was just an average experience for me

name: Salut
review: Finally I found a place in place in Jayanagar with music that loud and great which increases the buzz Food was great good Ambiance Little pocket unfriendly but worth it A Must visit place

name: Salut
review:
3 is for decent food and thats it nothing good about this place
we were group of 10 people we had ordered some food and we had spent around 45 mins there and boom for our surprise the management tells us to pay the cheque and move out because the bill wasnt more than 1k Though we had told them we would order sometime later
we didnt want to spoil the celebrations so we didnt argue much and ordered some more food and drinks which summed around 4k and later the waiter gives some cheap look as if we are eating for free this was one of the worst restaurant I have ever been careful you guys everything you do matter we are in digital world act responsibly

ps food was decent
and place wasnt that great ambiance

name: Salut
review: Ambience is great and I like the starters most  it tastes very good  and should keep more drinks available alcohol its good to hangout there

review: Finally I found a place in place in Jayanagar with music that loud and great which increases the buzz Food was great good Ambiance Little pocket unfriendly but worth it A Must visit place

name: Salut
review:
3 is for decent food and thats it nothing good about this place
we were group of 10 people we had ordered some food and we had spent around 45 mins there and boom for our surprise the management tells us to pay the cheque and move out because the bill wasnt more than 1k Though we had told them we would order sometime later
we didnt want to spoil the celebrations so we didnt argue much and ordered some more food and drinks which summed around 4k and later the waiter gives some cheap look as if we are eating for free this was one of the worst restaurant I have ever been careful you guys everything you do matter we are in digital world act responsibly

ps food was decent
and place wasnt that great ambiance

All in all this restaurant was just an average experience for me

name: Lassi Stop
review:
Worst moctails everThe taste of 3 out of 4 moctails were bad and vaguely similar
The containers were half filled and werent marked
Delivery was fast though

name: Lassi Stop
review: Lassi mud coffee faluda ice Cream french fries moheto aloo tikkiare must try items taste very good well maintained hygienegood service

name: Lassi Stop
review: 30 min late delivered

name: Lassi Stop
review: Awesome lassi and death by chocolate crispy corn is super and good service and staff environment also and atmosphere and surrounding and qauality

name: Dakshin Kitchen
review: Whats special here you ask Try their Tomato shavige bath or Uli avvalakki which is super delicious Somedays they have millets like Navane bath khara bath sweet bath  Idli and coffee are also the favourite Just steps away from buzzing traffic of Basavanagudi My regular bf place

name: Dakshin Kitchen
review:
This place is good for a quick bite of authentic south Indian cuisine I personally love their idlis and millet pongal  The chutney is absolutely delicious Kara bhaath is also decent
Their Chinese kitchen offers soups for 15 Rs  Pretty decent for the price  The Hakka Chinese starters are equally good  The fried rice and noodles are good 
Ambience35
Taste4
Value for money5
Overall rating 4

name: Sri Sai Cafe
review: taste was not good

name: Sri Sai Cafe
review: Awesome dosai personally hate dosa but once u have dosa in this cafe u will love it All other foods are also tasty Price wise excellent

name: Sri Sai Cafe
review:
Great place Spotted rhis place by chance
Was looking for parking and noticed this place
We were there for evening Tiffin and ordered different varieties of dosas All of them were tasty
Not like darshinis were they look good but no taste Really glad we visited this place

name: Sri Sai Cafe
review:
U will get the best dosa in and around this area or may be Bangalore as well
Vada and sambar as well

name: Sri Sai Cafe
review:
Awesome dishes which I really loved  foods are to tasty I would like to give 5 stars awesome keep it up
the best cafe ever

name: Sri Sai 99 Variety Dosa
review: Had Sweet Corn Schezwan Dosa and Golmaal Dosa yesterday It was really good Small place with great taste Liked the twist to dosa they make Kudos

name: Sri Sai 99 Variety Dosa
review: One of the best 99 variety dose shops in Bangalore Never dissatisfied me with the varieties of dose here Since 4 years Im visiting this place and always love to try new variety But I take schezwan veg roll all the time which is my favourite dish here So yummy so tasty so delicious

name: Sri Sai 99 Variety Dosa
review: The name itself says it all variety of dosasu can also ask for the choice of your toppings on the dosa In simple u get a customised dosa of your choice My all tym favourite is pizza dosa and Schezwan corn cheese dosa These dosas are filled with cheeeseeeeee

name: Sri Sai 99 Variety Dosa
review:
Great variety of dosas They are located right next to Big bazaar in Katriguppe Small joint with limited plastic stools to sit and enjoy the dosa Personal favourite  Sweet corn dosa and Spring vegetable dosa
One suggestion  To get best of the taste eat the dosa hot instead of getting parcelled

name: Utsav Restaurant
review:
Service  45
Taste  45

Cheap great quantity brilliant taste and a good variety in cuisine and food items What more do you need
Perfect place to eat on a budget or even in general A full stomach in less than or equal to 150
1010 recommend this place to everyone especially college students who find their mess or pg food stale boring and monotonous

name: Utsav Restaurant
review:
This place is located exactly behind BMS hostel easily identifiable in the busy roads This place is a pure vegetarian restaurant with nice ambience with lights all around Seatings are available
Ordered 1 Harabara kabab with was crispy and tasty but the cost of it wasnt satisfactory
2 ordered Malai kofta for the Indian bread
The gravy was thick and creamy with the kofta balls which were soft
3 Ordered Plain roti and garlic naan Indian breads was quiet good

Overall the place and food was good The place looks good in the evening with the lights

name: Utsav Restaurant
review:
Food  810
Service  710
Ambience  810
Cost 810

A good vegetarian restaurant in banashankari The food tastes very good Most of the time its crowded so it becomes a bit noisy in it but the ambience and rest very good They can make their service a quite better

name: Crunch and Munch
review: An amazing place for evening snack and dinner  they serve a unique variety of food here  must try chats ice cream and parathas here  the prices are also very reasonable

name: Crunch and Munch
review: Uttarahalli was really longing a good cafe to chill in the weekends Crunch n munch seemed to have filled that void Great place decent Ambience good quality food n great variety have tried Dahi BHEL puri baby corn chilly and cutlet chat All of these items were really tasty and totally worth the money

name: Crunch and Munch
review:
This is a new outlet in uttarahalli
Specially for veg snacks
If you love mushrooms you should definitely try mushrooms pepper dry They have gulkand pani Puri which is yumm too Amazing presentation which tempts you to gobble all the food
Value for money too

name: Crunch and Munch
review:
This is a new Chats Shop in Uttarhalli
It is nice and diffrent chats Chinese and Icecreams available

Ambience is small and nice Cleanliness is maintained Staff are quick

We tried bhel puri bombay special chats and special cutlet masala It was nice

Chinese innovative items are also good

Biriyani flavour icecream is avilable too

Make sure you dont miss visiting this outlet

name: Food Geek
review: My search for veg edible basket ended here Its damn yummy n all the other dishes that we tried are supa dupa Gud n ambience location too good Value for money

name: Food Geek
review:
Its a nice place with chaats sandwiches Pastas and chinese items Loved their soupIt matched my spice levelsTheir Babycorn hot pot is a spicy dishNice starter and Manchurian Momos were excellent too Very pocket Friendly Its self service and place is neat Would definitely visit again to explore few more dishes
If cold beverages are introduced it will be more nice

On my second visit enjoyed more delicasies like Cheese Masala Puri wonton soup Leefu momos Hot Tea American Chopusey Rolls crispy honey pepper Paneer

name: Food Geek
review:
located near basavanagudi  ammas pastries with some hidden delicacies tried paneer chilli along with corn kernels and veg rice every one of them was tasting pretty well
this place is perfect for college goers and friends to catch up

on the flip side place is pretty packed all the times and tough to find a parking spot also roads are pretty narrow this might make this place for one to think before they choose

and regarding the pricing it hardly burns up to 150300 per person for trying 6 dishes

name: Sri Krishna Aramane
review:
I visit this place regularly best place for bf lunch or dinner  self serviceill straight tell u guys it is best here
1Aki idli
2rava idli
3Palav
4best pongal
5dahi Vada
6 mughlai Biryanifried rice Manchurian
Do try ice creams here its the best
Chats I give it a 3 star
Best is Breakfast here do try

name: Sri Krishna Aramane
review: Kind of darshini types Surprisingly chinese food was very nice we ordered singapore noodles and it tasted very good Pretty decent and affordable place

name: Sri Krishna Aramane
review:
Decent and affordable place for bachelors and families

Yummy and hot dosas Extra points for the strong filter coffee Dosas are mouth watering and will definitely help you put on weight

name: Great Indian Rolls
review:
It located behind the SOUTH END metro station a small place with no seating  The cook were polite and polite  We had chicken rolls which was amazing  The chicken was well marinated and was a perfect roll 
We also tries the VEG CHEESY PASTA was not that good as compared to other white sauce pasta  It was a cause for money overall  A must place to eat great rolls

name: Chats Point
review:
Place for pani puri and sandwich lovers
Masalapuri and veg sandwich is one of the best
Clean and hygienic
Service is good
Ambience is good

name: Food Point
review: I ordered for chicken fried rice and egg roll Fried rice packing was worst like they pack in road side food And in chicken fried rice there were no chicken at all it was like egg fired rice Totally it was below par food  Not upto mark

name: Food Point
review: The food was not delivered to me

name: Food Point
review: This what they send for 90 rs not at allworth for 50 RS also and taste is also badwastage of money Zomato should ban this restaurantpathetic

name: Food Point
review: it was bot hot nd rhe chicken curry was spoiled

name: Food Point
review: paratha s was not gid

name: Food Point
review: biryani was nice kabab was not good

name: Food Point
review: not good in taste

name: Food Point
review:
Schzwen noodles taste is awesome
quality food with good quantity
delivery on time
value for moneygo for it

name: Food Point
review: wow chicken biryani simply wow and meel whatever they serve its like a home food they always give taja  i like hindi food  chicken biryani i loveeeeee chicken biryani

name: Food Point
review: I ordered Aloo paratha it was totally bad and was like a salad Aloo partha was half baked and my stomach is paining till now I would rate in negative stars if possible i will never recommend this restaurant to any one

name: Food Point
review: Less quantity Very bad

name: Food Point
review: Ordered special handi chicken tandoori pahadi kabab nd tandoori roti It was yummy  Had tasty food after long time value for money wud like 2 order again very soon

name: Food Point
review: Ordered Chicken Handi and Nan Real desi taste of chickenwill refere to Friends must try Handi chicken and Nan value for money will visit again

name: Food Point
review:
Chinese cuisines are really very good in taste
Tried munchurians  noodles
Dry chicken items are really good to try here
Worth for money Pocket friendly

name: Food Point
review: Ordered manchurian and paneer curry The colour of the gravy was good but there was no taste to it Manchurian was ok ok sort Overall not value for money

name: Swarga Ruchi
review:
Worst food ordered masala dosa got something else in the name of dosa that to very worst of all
Sambar is not good given salt water in the name of sambar worst food

name: Swarga Ruchi
review:
Quality Foodwe regularly visit here for dinner
Onion  Panner paratha is a must try item
Rice baths are superb
Methi chappathi  veg curries are alsoTasty

name: Swarga Ruchi
review: Very good place for quick bites very hygene homly food with very reasonable price Here many variations are available even davangere masale mandakki was excellent

name: Swarga Ruchi
review:
We had been there for breakfast Its a fast food outlet Chapathi and enGai is is my favorite
They have a very wide variety for breakfast Like shavige idly vada dosa and many more The food is soo homely And tummy happy

name: Swarga Ruchi
review: Its a very small jointself service hotel Very tasty and hygiene is maintained Homely food and rates are reasonable too Variety of food available Loved their brinjal curry  Dosa and Pitakpappu was best Tried vadas idly shavigebath and lemon rice too Those craving for homely foodits must advised place

name: Kolkata King
review: The food wasnt worth even half the price  The taste was horrible and the portions even less I hope they start catering to the needs of the customer by making proper food as per their prices

name: Sandwich Mama's And Frozen Monster
review:
This is small eatery opened recently in Jayanagar
Decided to try this few days back They have a wide variety of menu
Sandwich burgers chats maggie twisters Waffles Ice creams and lot more
We tried paneer maggie chats sandwich mushroom roll and waffle
The panner dint seem fresh at all either was not good or undercooked Even the veggies in the roll were not fresh at all Dint like it much
Sandwich and Waffle were good though
Pricing is very cheap pretty appropriate i would say for the kinda place they are running
Overall very average dont think ill be visiting again

name: New Rajadhani Spicy
review: Called their Egg Masala Combo via Zomato Rotis were not that great Chicken Kebab and Egg Masala was average Food was fresh though Requires improvement

name: Big Mishra Pedha
review: While the sweets and Khara items are good the chaat items are just average The other thing missing here is smiling and friendly staff Used to be a regular her but with so many other options available visit this place only when someone is specific about buying peda from here

name: Big Mishra Pedha
review: The shop for all sweet lovers Huge variety of sweet and snacks I got confused about what to pick There sweets quality are really very good Apart from sweets I had their samosa pav vaji dhokla They were pretty good and reasonable Located at prime location amidst the hustle of Jayanagar this place is surely worth try and money

name: Big Mishra Pedha
review:
Unreasonable

Had been here for our evening snacks I took a vada pav and sev puri Vada pav was average but the sev puri was a disaster The puri used for the sev puri was the pani puri hollow puri when I checked this with the chaat maker he says that I had to order for Bombay shev puri if I wanted the flat puris Well its your responsibility to let the customers know what each chaat menu has in it Anyway never again

name: VEGeatz
review:
Food  910
Service  710
Ambience  810

Food here is very good with lot of varieties Very good place for hostelites and bachelors Staff here is good and cooperative Ambience is okay

name: Foodizo
review: I have been going to this place since its opened in banshankari theyre consistently serving good food with finger licking taste at very low prices Must try the white sauce paste Cheesy Nachos especially the Chocolate waffle its yummy never had such a great waffle and last but not the least everyone must try the cheesy loaded mushroom balls they crispy from outside and cheesy from inside Yum it is

name: Foodizo
review:
The best cafe to hangout friendly staff hygiene as well yum food served with love 
Peaceful  maintenance upto level
Menu is interesting  pocket friendly best place to have delicious snack

name: Foodizo
review: We had been just today evening ordered for red sauce pasta which was just in place  Onion rings had too much oil and tasted lil ewww Lime soda was gud  Overall ok experience

name: Foodizo
review: One of the finest place to treat yourself with such pleasanteries Be it for home delivery or at their own hub Love the taste and their varieties Waffle is just amazing Crispy and delicious as its served My all time favourite would be their loaded fries stuffed with plenty of cheese Followed with Mississippi mud stuffed with brownie and wildly decorated toppings Amazing Its simply a food lovers place to hangout

name: Foodizo
review: Ever been in a situation where you just get this urge and cravings for something different This is the destination for that  FoodizoIsBae Chef Jibrans amazing lip smacking recipe for pasta did wonders for my date

name: Foodizo
review:
Visited the place a couple of times
Have tried the veggie nuggets and potato pops along The prices are very reasonable and worth the price

The milkshakes are also worth a try

name: Foodizo
review:
Tried white sauce cheese pasta  Omg so bad pasta ever had not at all good  N for that rs 130 
Pasta not at all mixed with the sauce  no vegetables nothing  Just plane

name: Foodizo
review:
If your a vegetarian must visit this place Very pocket friendly and the food range is wide enough to satisfy your taste buds I tried waffles at this place it was very delicious and the Lebanese dish was mouth watering I recommend everyone to visit this place for the different taste and experience The staff was soo polite and friendly
Overall food 55
Ambience45
Service355try to serve a bit early

name: Foodizo
review:
What fast food

Ambience good

What I ordered hot chocolate brownie and death by chocolate

Well the place looks good and the food was good This s a very new place and ambience is quiet good the wallpaper looks different and elegant  You can visit this place in the evenings with frnds Yes I will visit this place again

name: Foodizo
review:
Calm and soothing place Amazing food served
Multiple options to choose from New in town but sure to lead in the area very soon  foodporn

name: Foodizo
review: Dont judge a book by its cover In this case dont judge this restaurant by the size of it I have visited this place accidentally with a friend recently Though the place looks small it is cozy and a perfect place to have some snacks or to chill out with friends The prices are reasonable here unlike other places where the items are overpriced and orerrated The menu is minimalistic and they are very good at what they make I tried Masala French fries and was stunned by the taste of mayonnaise given with fries The mayonnaise was absolutely fantastic Cheers to the chef I ordered Red velvet waffles tasted very good too My ratings are 45 for this place because I would love to see these people have cheesecakes in their menu Definitely will visit second time too

name: Foodizo
review: Wow nice and cozy place to chill  hangout with friends Ty are well knw at tr services with A1 fresh  quality food with vry reasonable ratesmust visitnjoy

name: Food Springs
review:
The food was not upto the mark Overused oil and stale paneer made the experience horrible Got our starter changed to the five spice babycorn only to be disappointed again
Will not recommended this place

name: Food Springs
review: I tried their hakka noodles with chilli mushroom for the first time and it was good Right amount of veggies in perfectly cooked noodles and chilli mushroom was tasty too crispy and spicy I would recommend it

name: Food Springs
review: Plz experience it Worth a try Paneer pops must try and their soups are  Jus t try it Its a regular place for me Economical it wont pinch your pocket

name: Food Springs
review: Very good Chinese food very friendly staff dragon crisp is very good and all the gravies are really good leffu rice my personal favourite and manchow soup mann

name: Food Springs
review: Very nice restaurant with nice ambience Staff is also courteous The food is really good Must visit for family and students They serve good Thai food They have nice mocktails

name: Food Springs
review: I ordered schezwan rice taste was good well packed hot but quantity was less overall its good

name: Food Springs
review:
Manchurian was dryshould have mentioned thereand its just Gobi Manchurian not VEGu
nless u count Gobi

name: Food Springs
review: I ordered 2 paneer pops from this place today evening out of the two paneer pops 1 was perfect and the otherwise one was too dam spicy Packing was pretty good

name: Food Springs
review: manchurian was not like usually I get

name: Food Springs
review:
The place is very good for vegetarians wishing for Chinese food Has everything covered from snacks to rice to noodles
Has few Mexican options as well The pricing is really impressive and even quantity is overwhelming
Lack of seating  not accepting card on the day I visited is my only complaint
They serve food in disposable organic plates Which is good  environment friendly

The Mexican rice was more like Chinese fried rice
The nachos  bean rice was decent but the nachos were soggy instead of being crispy
Dragon choupsey was great

name: Food Springs
review: The fries in the honey chilly were hard like chips with barely any honey at all

name: Food Springs
review: I wanted to give zero hopeless food

name: Food Springs
review: Like the food at this place However the fried noodles seemed old once when I checked

name: Food Springs
review: We were craving for some Chinese when we stumbled upon this place on zomato There are few benches to sit and have but nonetheless the food is amazing They have a variety of options in Chinese although all veg I had spring rolls honey chili potato and schezwan chowmein and all of them tasted really good There are two things that I would suggest Please focus on cleanliness as there is a drain just in front of the place and I did see four legged creatures running around Also it would be great if you could expland the seating section Im sure youll have a greater crowd than you already do

name: Food Springs
review: The food is just ok its not authentic the north indian rice items neither taste like a north indian dish nor like a mexican dish It is neither a must visit nor a must avoid place

name: Food Springs
review: Food quality is generally good at Food Springs but two dishes today panner pops and the soup wasnt good at all today really bad

name: Food Springs
review: This is purely for my delivery order I m not at all happy about piping hot food packed in plastic containers as they leech chemicals The taste of manchurian and honey chilli potatoes were very average

name: Food Springs
review: the food here is just awesome n filling its one of the best places to hog n the eveningthey serve hot n yummy foodthe taste is been the same since so long

name: Food Springs
review:
Its a tiny restaurant in Jayanagar the food can be filling and its inexpensive

The best honey chili potato is found in this restaurant Theres a perfect mix of sweet and spicy
Another good starter is panner pops

Amongst soda pops Citrus blast is recommended

The items to try out are Singapore Noodles and Malaysian noodles

name: Food Springs
review:
I always wanted to check this place when I often used to visit 4th Tea block nearby to thisGot time today to have some snacks and ordered Paneer pops and Schezwan Chowmeen
Had thought Paneer pops would be smaller in size but when received was shocked to see the size of popsIts really hard for one to finish themThey give 10 pieces of pops for 100rsYet they were very tasty without sauce too 
Schezwan noodles or Chowmeen was good to taste with more vegetablesAs we had finished eating pops we felt our tummy being heavy and had to finish noodles forcefully
Its a small place where there are benches outside on a roadsideWill try more dishes from the menu
Food  355
Service  self
Vfm 35

name: Food Springs
review:
Got some Chinese cravings This is the place for you
This is situated in the road opposite to meghana foods
You dont have seating herebut that hardly matters cos u ll be finishing d food in one go
Sadly they have stopped serving Combos Wish they could revive it

name: Food Springs
review: My friend recommended this little outlet Firstly well maintained place Service is quickwe ordered a Machine soupOne pot baby cornLeefu Riceall the items ordered were very tasty and value for moneyvegeterians you can feast here Only problem is no seating available

name: Food Springs
review:
Best indo chinese thai restaurent
Pocket friendly High quality and delicious dishes

Back side of Jayanagar bus stop

Must try pure veg restaurant

name: Food Springs
review:
Nice mini food truck at the centre of city Value for money Very tasty starters and main course Wide variety options too

Cleanliness is well maintained and very quick service

name: Food Springs
review:
Food  soups ok Starters and main course too oily and salty I think they use lot of ajinomotomsg

Ambience  road side stand and eat place No ambience

Service  mediocre

General  Weekend orders are shitty Especially to go and home delivery orders there are wrong items sent Last time the dip sauce was thinned down by adding water wen I ordered food home The person taking the order is busy on his phone when a customer is there placing order

name: Food Springs
review: You order 1 thing they send out another and dont even accept the mistake Horrible service They do not care what the customer expectsthey dont follow special instruction

name: Food Springs
review: Horrible foodthis was by far my worst experience with ChineseWhere do you guys get the idea of putting cauliflower in Chineseveg in hunanI ordered 3items all three tasted terribly badOnly the complementary raita was finegravy seemed like soup while the rice was soggyI wonder how someone can make corns taste badMoney wastedWouldnt have it ever again even if they pay me to

name: Food Springs
review:
A food truck turned into a fast food joint and serving some amazing chinese vegetarian food in the streets of jayanagar is pure bliss for people who wants to have quick bites during lunch hour A small place which has 2 tables to sit outside the counter and can sit peacefully and eat

I went there for quick luch and ordered paneer chilly and hakka noodles with hunan sauce  Service is prompt and quick Paneer chilly was so hot and could make out that its prepared fresh Absolutey loved the taste and it was authentic chinese flavour Hakka noodles with veggies in hunan sauce was surprisingly packed with amazing flavours and it was lip smacking This was the best chinese food I have eaten in a long time

Definetely good quantity for the price paid I would go back again to try their starters which I have heard is pretty amazing So until the cheers

name: Food Springs
review:
Its your neighbourhood restaurant for your Chinese food cravings Food tastes good but they lack consistency

Location 45
Food 4
Service 3
Value for money 4

review: quantity very less compared to the price

name: Food Springs
review: good

name: Food Springs
review:
Very less quantity and not tasteful

So we ordered 3 noodles 1fried rice and 2panner chilli and 1 black pepper gravy The quantity was really less and not tasteful at all
I ordered from Zomato and somehow they did not get the order and I had to reorder on the call
The food was not worth the wait and was too expensive according to the Quantity Paneer was not panner but rubber and there was no difference in taste of panner chilli gravy and black pepper gravy

name: Food Springs
review: Ordered hyderabadi biryani honey chilli potato hakka noodles Honey chilli potato was really yummy Noodles also tasted really good Hyderabadi biryani was also nice but in comparison didnt stand out

name: Food Springs
review:
The pricing issue here is that for the money we pay we get a very mearge quantity with Alo paying gst in a roadside shack
Either the price should be reduced or quantity should be increased
The food was good we can give the food a 35
I had ordered a tandoori mushroom rice and the mushrooms were not fried properly The staff is also a bit rude

name: Food Springs
review:
Stopped by for some snacks 
Spring roll was very filling  very well made  not too oily served wit a yummy hot and sweet sauce
Honey chili potato was yummmm too
They have soda pops that cost 70rs and they only serve 12 a glass for some reason  Not worth it at all 
The option for drinks is very less  nothing that I wanted to order 
They took very long to prepare  They claim that everything is freshly made  but for a local fast food option they take way toooo much time to prepare

name: Food Springs
review: The place isnt like how it is here There is no freaking seat here to sit After starving a while searching for it it totally disappointed is like shit The food in the menu seemed yumm But never mind about the actual food And the minimum rating was one  or I would have given 0

name: Food Springs
review: A place for taste and quality  please do visit the place  im sure you would get back to the place again Every dish is simple and great

name: Food Springs
review: A perfect take away food stop this is the place you should be redirected to Food is just perfect and you would wanna visit for some chinese food at a much lower cost Yet to try many options mentioned on the menu

name: Food Springs
review: Good food Not very expensive Love the crispy garlic potato Best Ive ever eaten so far All noodles are pretty good too Must visit if you are craving for Chinese and are OK with standing and eating

name: Food Springs
review: Good place to Hangout for some chinese food It tastes yum  the seating is a problem otherwise the food is really tasty Ive tried the Manchurian Green Apple ice tea Spring rolls tomato paneer nachos and specifically loved d Dragon chopsuey

name: Food Springs
review: This is a good  no frills place for ordering food home Decent food for the price and good for those craving some spicy Chinese food However  better to order on the higher quantity since most of the dishes are just about enough for one person

name: Food Springs
review: We had been there to have Paneer pops cos apparently this is the only place where we can get them Unfortunately they did not have it that day and we had to settle in for honey chilli potato which was awful And the ambience here is bad too

name: Food Springs
review: Awesome lip smacking indoChinese food Each time weve visited ourselves andor with friendsfamily members all of us have liked it so much that weve made it as a mandatory spot to have at least one item here everytime we pass by

name: Food Springs
review: Great quality food at a very affordable price The paneer pops are great and so were the spring rolls Was pleasantly surprised with this restaurant Keep it up

name: Food Springs
review: Small place but fabulous food their food is spectacular best for delivery Their fried wontons rock all their starters were very good Great value n reasonable price We njoyed all we ordered and were highly satisfied Definitely will order again n again Superb job thumbs up

name: Food Springs
review:
Firstly the delivery was made after an hour On the top got a wrong delivery
When called they give me some odd reasons They say they call up Zomato How will Zomato help when their delivery boys have goofed up
Would never order from here Probably you can go there and eat

name: Food Springs
review: A very small joint with no seating but has a variety of food Its known for Chinese cuisine I had got the food delivered through swiggy app The food is delicious Loved the spring rolls Paneer pockets and szechuan chowmein The Singapore noodles wasnt up to the mark And the chilly garlic potato was bad Want cooked properly too The Szechuan fried rice and choupsey were good but all Szechuan dishes taste alike Over all it was satisfying

name: Food Springs
review: For a street food experiencethis place is good Their meal combos are very cost effective If you are in a hurry and need Chinese foodthis is the place to go to

name: Food Springs
review: This place is lit I mean its okay that it is a stand eat outlet but the food is delicious they also have a food truck which is great This place serves ChineseThai curry and their did is delicious springrolls on point That serve in paper containers of high quality and its keeps up the food truck tradition of paper bowls All in all great food Great service Great prices Until next time Cheers

name: Food Springs
review: This is a small food outletwith lot of food varietiesWell there was a long queueAnd we had to wait for longto get the stuff we had orderedManagent is not goodFood quality was okayThe food isnt very costly

name: Food Springs
review:
Excellent food
Really tasty Very filling quantity 
Very refreshing and innovative drinks too
Good joint for friends to get together at
Pretty pocket friendly too

name: Food Springs
review: One of the best place to get Chinese snacks for a decent price Loved the honey chilli potato  hotpot babycorn and honey pepper paneer But over the last two months  the quality has come down We used to enjoy coming to the place  but because of the degraded quality in taste we have looked at other places to hang out If the owner of the outlet reads this  please do check whats wrong  we found that the honey pepper paneer recently served to us was very oily  also the honey chilli potato no longer has the balance between the honey and chilli Would love to rate it 5 after my next visit and tasting the delights

name: Food Springs
review: Wanted to visit this place from a long time Food is amazing and the soda pops personal favorite is passion fruit which is amazing Good food overall a nice food joint in jayanagar

name: Food Springs
review:
A small place with lot of options to offer at pocket friendly price Loved the Babycorn Manchurian here The service is good  food is served hot  fresh Have also tried fried rice spring rolls noodles  taste was good However the paneer pops was just  worst no flavours  paneer cubes were very big

Have tried this place many times now new favourites are honey chilli potato n crispy noodles

name: Food Springs
review:
A decent option for takeaway Chinese Food Springs ought to be on your try it once list My culinary experience is limited to the one takeaway from here which included a Honey Chilli Potato as a starter a Schezwan Fried Rice and a Gobi Manchurian dry

The Honey Chilli Potato was a bit too sweet for my taste while the Rice was flavorful and thankfully not sticking to each other making clumps The Gobi Manchurian was pretty run of the mill though

The food is spiced adequately and the service is warm and welcomingThe only con is that the place is somewhat difficult to locate the first time

Recommended for veggie Chinese fans

name: Food Springs
review:
Excellent food
Really tasty Very filling quantity 
Very refreshing and innovative drinks too
Good joint for friends to get together at
Pretty pocket friendly too

name: Food Springs
review: One of the best place to get Chinese snacks for a decent price Loved the honey chilli potato  hotpot babycorn and honey pepper paneer But over the last two months  the quality has come down We used to enjoy coming to the place  but because of the degraded quality in taste we have looked at other places to hang out If the owner of the outlet reads this  please do check whats wrong  we found that the honey pepper paneer recently served to us was very oily  also the honey chilli potato no longer has the balance between the honey and chilli Would love to rate it 5 after my next visit and tasting the delights

name: Food Springs
review: Wanted to visit this place from a long time Food is amazing and the soda pops personal favorite is passion fruit which is amazing Good food overall a nice food joint in jayanagar

name: Food Springs
review:
A small place with lot of options to offer at pocket friendly price Loved the Babycorn Manchurian here The service is good  food is served hot  fresh Have also tried fried rice spring rolls noodles  taste was good However the paneer pops was just  worst no flavours  paneer cubes were very big

Have tried this place many times now new favourites are honey chilli potato n crispy noodles

name: Food Springs
review:
A decent option for takeaway Chinese Food Springs ought to be on your try it once list My culinary experience is limited to the one takeaway from here which included a Honey Chilli Potato as a starter a Schezwan Fried Rice and a Gobi Manchurian dry

The Honey Chilli Potato was a bit too sweet for my taste while the Rice was flavorful and thankfully not sticking to each other making clumps The Gobi Manchurian was pretty run of the mill though

The food is spiced adequately and the service is warm and welcomingThe only con is that the place is somewhat difficult to locate the first time

Recommended for veggie Chinese fans

name: Food Springs
review:
This place is a small place with little sitting area outside
And its a pure veg
The food is brilliant
Like the noodles was amazing

name: Food Springs
review:
A nice place to grab a quick bite Reasonable prices with reasonable portions The dishes are on a spicy note for my palate however the taste is good

Must try Chinese bhel dragon rolls

name: Food Springs
review:
This place is located inside a lane behind BMTC bus stand Jayanagar 4th block Small fast food joint take away kind of place Theres no tables to sit only two benches provided You either need to stand and eat or take away a parcel and enjoy your food at your home 
Ordered for fried babycorn hot pot style szechuan fried rice and noodles Loved the Babycorn it was really yummy while szechuan fried rice was good enough Noodles were very oily and not worth it Quantity served is average for ricenoodles and too less for starters 
This could be your best bet for Pure Vegetarian Chinese food if few improvements in food is done

name: Food Springs
review:
Place is much like a take away center but serves good quantities for one person for more of Chinese and other food only in Vegeterian Option

On the weekends it is very bad to plan for a quick meal because it is a long pending orders which cannot be completed for the small kitchen

Otherwise it doing good for quality and quantity for each eatable quantity

Different versions of Nachos are available and goodto eat

Enjoy for the pleasure eating on a week day and also a dry day as the place does not have shelters for sit and eat

name: Food Springs
review: It is a quick serve restaurant and its menu is quite simple with few combos and it serves for my lunch and dinner The quality is assured and the location is very good But however the place has just 2 tables to accomodate 10 ppl maximum on fridays its hard to find space to sit at your comfort However it is best not to burn your pockets and its good to fill your belly

name: Food Springs
review: This place is inside the locality of jayanagar 4block near 4Tea block price worthI had took lemon tea  ginger capsicum rice both were taste and place is difficult to search for first time for second time its easy

name: Food Springs
review:
The quantity of food served in sumptuous and filling
Real tasty Chinese food The sauce though was very average and ruined the overall taste

name: Food Springs
review: This place is quite amazing Kind of quality is here really good The quantity is really less in some of the options like nachos Coz a plate of nachos cost rs100 and we recieve a less Other than that the menu is filled with exciting varities Cearly we wont be able to try all even after maybe two to three visits Potato honey is so great i guess thats worth for its price Looking forward to come back and try some more

name: Food Springs
review: Small and nice place in jayanagar Food is nice and if you love spicy noodles then Malaka Noodles is a must try Location is bit inside I had to use Google maps to reach

name: Food Springs
review:
This place is good for evening hangout and tried this place to please my craving towards Chinese food I found this place under food truck category under Zomato which is rare in India atleast in Bangalore The place is great and known more for take aways as there is less space in front of the food joint to dine in The menu is exhaustive with majority of Chinese bit of Indian and Mexican along with mocktails Binged on Thai Fried baby corn and Hakka noodles both tasted great but felt quantity provided was quite less for the price otherwise the quality is excellent

foodpunditbengaluruwordpresscom

name: Food Springs
review: Nice vegetarian Chinese food Need to wait on street and eat As it is located on low traffic street you manage Value for money Service is warm

name: Food Springs
review: If you are searching for a Chinese place with a taste more on the spicy side here is the place Located amidst the colonial areas of jayanagar they do provide some mouth watering Chinese delicacies With a room size area I am sure they are the best in that area atleast  Also they have quite a few varieties  Ideal for snack time and sometimes carry away meals as well  Can say it is a must try in jayanagar

name: Food Springs
review:
Ordered food online from here and it really made my Sunday
The delivery was quick and food was very hot when it arrived Liked the taste and the quantity was great for the price
I liked the Manchow soup and butter garlic rice
Panner chill however was average
Would like to visit the place and try it

name: Food Springs
review:
Food Springs
A place to end for Chinese and Indian Street Foods
Located near Kandaala Jewels opp to Uttara Karnataka meals restaurant
This is food truck concept  where this is one of the outlet
Menu has varieties like Soups Snacks Drinks Chow  Mein Rice Gravy and Lunch items
Ended up ordering Combo meal where it had option of Soup Starter Gravy and Main course
Wanted to try Lemonade ordered that too
Ordered Funky Paneer frankie too

Started with soup had option of Veg clear soup and Noodle soup choose Veg clear soup
Trust me it was burning hot and yumm contained fresh veggies 
Lemonade was also worth
Combo was served within 10 min and starter was fried Momo kind Gravy was also yumm with proper spices
Main course Fried rice was also hot and good
Funky Paneer was something different compared to all the above It was tossed with some nice tangy sauce onions capsicum and Paneer 

Planning to head soon to try other items from the menu

name: Food Springs
review:

name: Food Springs
review:
Located on a side road its very hard to spot but still its always crowded There is no seating available
The service is quick and the food tastes good
The menu is overloaded with dishes you have ample of dishes to order
I tried the fried rice and shezwan fried riceboth tasted average How ever I would recommend to taste the Gobi manchuri they make its delicious
The quantity they offer for the cost is pretty reasonable Doesnt burn a hole In your pocket
But doesnt fill your tummy too
Overall its a nice place to visit

Updating over my second visit
Tried the baby corn pot fry which is mind blowing It tastes perfect had never tried a dish so different and delicious 
tasted almost every noodle and rice on the menu except hakka noodles every dish is loaded with spices and flavors

name: Food Springs
review: Heard bout this place frm a senior nd checked t reviews n was very excited to try it place is very small but food was yumm though i tried jus 2 dishes nd a drink i was impressed paneer pop was very mild nd i liked it peri peri rice was yumm nd spicy its a must try fr all spicy lovers pocket friendly nd nice Chinese itmes

name: Food Springs
review: Tried the food from this place completely based on Zomato reviews and I actually liked it I really liked their Peri Peri mixed rice Gobi Manchurian was crispy and good Hakka noodles and dragon rolls could have been better This will probably become my go to place for Chinese near home

name: Food Springs
review: Honestly one of the best Chinese takeawaysLove the taste and the wide variety of foodHopefully there will be a better seating arrangement soonbeing a regular customer at afternoonits a bit uneasy to sit in the sun Try the chow miens and the chop suey they are brilliantHappy dining

name: Food Springs

name: Food Springs
review:
So it was a holiday and I have started yet again a failed attempt to reduce hence wanted to eat something light not expensive and yet upscaled Found this place on Zomato and decided to give it a try

The one problem I find with every Chinese outlet or restaurant is that you buy 2 dishes and booooooom you end up spending 500 or 1000 in some cases

Food spring a small outlet with a wide range of Chinese and the best part is price and taste Its just awesome more than that its pure veg We had a Hunan wanton soup stir fried green veggies and peri peri mixed rice A three course meal for 2 for just 320

The only issue was there was more salt for first 2 dishes once we notified them they reduced it for the third dish Overall a great place to grab Chinese cuisine on a budget

Price  810
Taste  910
Service  810
Ambience  610
Value for money  810
Will I go back  Waiting to go back

name: Food Springs
review:
Food Spring was found by chance and it surprised us

Its a small tiny place located in Jayanagar 4th block near to 4th tea block

Its a veg fast food restaurant and with selfservice Menu card was available with lot of options from Rice to Drinks

We ordered for Tandoori mushroom rice and waited for 15 mins
It was prepared fresh and served hot

Rice was served in Paper bowl with Curd raita
Taste was ultimate it was with full of fresh mushroom cooked to perfection
Spicy tasty and seasoned

Ambiance  2  No place to sit comfortably
Rate  3 Bit expensive to service and Quantity
Taste  35 
Service  2

enjoy your fooood

sandeepkasalwordpresscom

name: Food Springs
review: I have not tried in jayanager but I have tried there food spring point in jp nager near RV COLLEGE they served fast and clean I liked the szechuan paneer and green apple drink but I felt its price is bit high and there is only one table so you need to stand

name: Food Springs
review: My friend ordered home deliverythe chilly garlic rice was too goodNeat packaging fast deliveryaffordablekeep it up cant wait to try chinese bhel

name: Food Springs
review:
This tiny and tidy place in tucked somewhere inside a small lane in jaynagar 4th block Its a pure vegetarian place and one with clean ambience in the category They have very modest ambience with just two benches outside the kitchen counter but you get one of the best Chinese Mexican dishes in town for affordable prices I had ordered kripsy corn kernels nachos with rice and noodle soup Corn was served in a thin cardboard box and could serve for take away purpose also It was roasted corn with right amount of spices Noodle soup was damn hot and i burnt my tongue several times but was worth it Nachos with rice is a pure delight
To the management i know your main orders come from various online portals but do give attention to people waiting at counter and not just take order and make them wait for 40minutes

name: Food Springs
review:
Food Spring was found by chance and it surprised us

Its a small tiny place located in Jayanagar 4th block near to 4th tea block

Its a veg fast food restaurant and with selfservice Menu card was available with lot of options from Rice to Drinks

We ordered for Tandoori mushroom rice and waited for 15 mins
It was prepared fresh and served hot

Rice was served in Paper bowl with Curd raita
Taste was ultimate it was with full of fresh mushroom cooked to perfection
Spicy tasty and seasoned

Ambiance  2  No place to sit comfortably
Rate  3 Bit expensive to service and Quantity
Taste  35 
Service  2

enjoy your fooood

sandeepkasalwordpresscom

name: Food Springs
review: I have not tried in jayanager but I have tried there food spring point in jp nager near RV COLLEGE they served fast and clean I liked the szechuan paneer and green apple drink but I felt its price is bit high and there is only one table so you need to stand

name: Food Springs
review: My friend ordered home deliverythe chilly garlic rice was too goodNeat packaging fast deliveryaffordablekeep it up cant wait to try chinese bhel

name: Food Springs
review:
This tiny and tidy place in tucked somewhere inside a small lane in jaynagar 4th block Its a pure vegetarian place and one with clean ambience in the category They have very modest ambience with just two benches outside the kitchen counter but you get one of the best Chinese Mexican dishes in town for affordable prices I had ordered kripsy corn kernels nachos with rice and noodle soup Corn was served in a thin cardboard box and could serve for take away purpose also It was roasted corn with right amount of spices Noodle soup was damn hot and i burnt my tongue several times but was worth it Nachos with rice is a pure delight
To the management i know your main orders come from various online portals but do give attention to people waiting at counter and not just take order and make them wait for 40minutes

myhungertaleswordpresscom

name: Food Springs
review: Saw this place while strolling around Jayanagar 4Th block placed an order for Home delivery through Zomato Received the order within 45 mins Had ordered Mushroom Manchurian Honey chilly potatoes Szechuan fried Rice and Dragon choupsey Except for Mushroom Manchurian which was tasteless the other items which we ordered were reasonably good Taking into account the quality and quantity of the good the prices are reasonable

name: Food Springs
review: They had a food truck placed near bsk bda complex i had gone for a take away Plus point for me was that it is pure vegetarian The options were limited but good for a truck The owners were present and were attending personally We asked them to make without msg and they did so The food tasted good Overall a good try

name: Food Springs
review: This small eatery offers u many items in their menu This exclusively veg eatery shop with Chinese eateries Prices are comparatively cheap Food served is completely fresh n hot n tasty too Must try the monchow soup n Chinese bhel over here Absolutely finger licking Also try the schezwan rice Only thing it lack is the proper sitting arrangement Other than that its completely worth going over here A must try for veg Chinese lovers

name: Food Springs
review:
This is a small eatery tucked in a by lane of 4th block I have been here nearly 56 times now and it is my favorite spot for Chinese food
Pros 
Good variety on offer
Hygienic and clean
High quality
Very good taste
Right pricing
Packing for takeaway is excellent

Cons
Seating is not convenient It is basically few benches
Service may take time sometimes

Recommendations
Mushroom pepper chilli spicy
Honey chilli potato
Paneer pops Non spicy
Spring rolls
Thai fried babycorn

name: Food Springs
review:
The place is located perfectly but
Located right behind the main bus stand in Jayanagar they are very easy to find  The thing here is that they give hot hot food and you barely cab hold it in your hand They have 2 benches and a upraised table for keeping the served food  The ambience is bright lit store with cockroaches coming towards usI could literally count 45 roaches coming towards us 
The staff was neat in explaining the food took the Baby Corn Hot Pot Styleliked it but would had lived it if the pieces were cut in halvesneat combination of pepper and chillithe scwezwan fried rice was good quantity but lacked proper flavour and I needed to mix ketchup to compliment it
Experience was mediocre
Price 45
Quantity 45
Quality 25 seriously cock roaches
Ambience 35
Taste 35
Worth it  Its ok  The place and pavement could have been better

name: Food Springs
review:
This is a great place for amazing snacks
Really delicious food here
I had paneer pops and spring rolls and both of these dishes were amazing
Heads up spring roll is spicy
And for pure vegetarians this place is the best
The only problem I found was that there isnt ample seating just four benches The waiting time is around 20 minutes which is really late
But its worth the wait I can say as the food was up to its mark

name: Food Springs
review: This rating is for their food truck which thus time was found at Swamy Vivekanand Metro station during a food festival We tried only their chilly chow mein which had the right chilly to make it absolutely delicious The coolers in this case Masala lemonade was nice too but for 80 bucks it was found to be expensive The service is quick despite rush and it being pure vegetarian cart gives extra satisfaction to the lot during rush chaos

name: Food Springs
review:
Womens Day special  for a change thought I will order food  Reading the Reviews online  I placed an order for home delivery today at 1230 pm it was expected to be delivered in an hours time but still waitingNo information on delivery time have called almost 5 times now

Finally it arrived at 245 pm all of us hungry and food was only average When I wanted to order curry for chapatis the person confirmed it will confirm along with it and no need to order separately But did not find any curry apart from a dhal not at all good And very spicy Manchurian and fried rice

Though it is middle of the week very poor service Next time will think twice to place an order

name: Food Springs
review: I am little generous rating this small food jointbecause I just loved the food hereA friend of mine advised me to have food here once atleast and people who know me they know how much I love vegetarian food  reluctantly tried this placebelieve me it took me by surpriseif u are hardcore veggie its a must visit

review: I am little generous rating this small food jointbecause I just loved the food hereA friend of mine advised me to have food here once atleast and people who know me they know how much I love vegetarian food  reluctantly tried this placebelieve me it took me by surpriseif u are hardcore veggie its a must visit

name: Food Springs
review: I love this place Perfect for a tasty hygienically served on the go bite at nonrestaurant prices The Asian food is really yum and the experience akin to eating at a dignified thela on the road You wont be disappointed if you enjoy the occasional hustle of standing and eating out of plastic ware in an unassuming city bylane Kudos to constant menu refreshments too

name: Food Springs
review: Very poor service especially in the afternoon they do not have most of the items on the menu The staff is very slow and take time to understand wat u r trying to convey

name: Food Springs
review:
Saw this place when we were looking for some nice evening snacks

Tried Chinese Bhel it was soo yummy
Baby corn Manchurian was tasty but very very spicy Nachos  been rice was Good

They serve in paper boxes Quantity is less quality is good

name: Food Springs
review:
I stay very close to this place  While passing the way I just saw this place and wanted to give a try Finally i ended up tasting delicious spicy paneer pops and per peri rice that was gr8 Finally a nice place with gr8 ambience Quality  food 

Cusines served INDIAN  Asian

name: Food Springs
review: This is my most favorite restaurant till date Paneer lovers must try paneer pops Each and every dish here is tasty n reasonable Its tidy and the ambience s also good and loved the hospitality I visit this place atleast thrice a week

name: Food Springs
review: I recently visited a food mela in maratha hostel near chamarajpet Food springs had their food truck which was an attraction in the mela I their honey chilli potato which tasted yum Looking forward to visit their food joints

name: Food Springs
review: Have to say what a taste every bite u get Just order anything u feel stoned with the taste Perfect snacks for the late evening salsa sticks are my favorite Small Neat Good Perfect

name: Food Springs
review: They are located very close to La Casa One evening was looking was for something different to eat in the evening then thought of this place as this was due for long time Since food is served outside we decided to take parcel We ordered mix veg manchuri panner pops potato honey stick nacho beans rice and noodles Veg manchuri was not very good too oily not many vegetables Paneer pops was good Both noodles and nacho rice was not good at all again it was too oily and taste was below average Quantity was also less

name: Food Springs
review: Paneer poops n the Salsa sticks are damn good  Worth the price  I like the cleanliness of this place its damn clean  N more over this place is in a residential are so its silent no traffic or no honking sounds  U can enjoy the food without ny noice

name: Food Springs
review:
Just had dinner here  its amazing  There are many wonderful varieties of starters but whats even better is the different types of rice 
Best here is Noodle soup paneer pops dragon roll  salsa sticks and the Nachobean rice
Definitely worth a try

name: Food Springs
review:
Food 5
Service 5
Hygiene 5
Price 5
Started by an youngster this is an new fast food spot in jayanagar Probably and new style of service wher in you get South Indian in the morning mixed Indian at afternoon and pure authentic Chinese in the evening  Best place for quick bite of food for morning walkers afternoon neighbours and evening shoppers Must try food joint

name: Food Springs
review: Visited this place frm some frns reference Ordered salsa sticks and kimchi toast Both were not upto the mark for toast the kimchi they kept is so cold n the bread is not even toasted its a new place n I think they have to improve it a lot its luk lik Chinese but doesnt taste like chinese

name: Food Springs
review:
Visited this place for take home delivery Loved the taste of all the food items which we took home
While waiting for our parcel drank strawberry lemonade the flavours in it was just as it should be
We ordered the following items and the price for each one was worth it
Salsa sticks
Chatpata paneer
Pulav lajawab
Pulka meal

This restaurant is worth it for its taste and price Although the menu is restricted Ie different during lunch and dinner You wont get the same item both the times

name: Food Springs
review: Got there to this place today Yummy rice specials and a lot of quantity for a really reasonable price Already doing a great job  no chicken though

name: Food Springs
review:
Just had dinner here  its amazing  There are many wonderful varieties of starters but whats even better is the different types of rice 
Best here is Noodle soup paneer pops dragon roll  salsa sticks and the Nachobean rice
Definitely worth a try
